recipes.name: Cheesy Egg Muffins
recipes.description: Bite-sized breakfast muffins packed with eggs, cheese, and veggies.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Add cheese and chopped vegetables.
Pour into greased muffin tin.
Bake for 20-25 minutes.

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
recipes.description: Juicy shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and herbs.
instructions: Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add shrimp, salt, pepper, and parsley.
Cook until pink and opaque.

recipes.name: Pinwheels with Cream Cheese and Ham
recipes.description: Flavorful and easy-to-make pinwheels, perfect for a quick snack or party appetizer.
instructions: Spread softened cream cheese evenly over low-carb tortillas.
Layer with slices of ham and a sprinkle of everything bagel seasoning.
Roll up tortillas tightly and slice into 1-inch pinwheels.
Chill for 15 minutes for easier slicing if preferred.
recipes.notes: Recipe 3 - Pinwheels with Cream Cheese and Ham

recipes.name: Spicy Roasted Almonds
recipes.description: Crunchy, spicy, and savory roasted almonds – an addictive keto snack.
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F.
Toss raw almonds with olive oil, smoked paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, and salt.
Spread in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, stirring halfway, until fragrant and lightly toasted.
Let cool completely.

recipes.name: Avocado Egg Boats
recipes.description: Nutrient-dense and satisfying baked avocado halves filled with eggs and your favorite toppings.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Halve avocados and remove pits.
Scoop out a little flesh to make space for the egg if needed.
Crack an egg into each avocado half.
Season with salt, pepper, and desired toppings (e.g., crumbled bacon, chives).
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until egg whites are set and yolks are to your liking.

recipes.name: Quick Coconut Chia Pudding
recipes.description: A simple, creamy, and make-ahead keto breakfast or dessert packed with fiber.
instructions: In a jar or bowl, combine full-fat coconut milk, chia seeds, keto-friendly sweetener (to taste), and a splash of vanilla extract.
Whisk well to combine.
Let sit for 5 minutes, then whisk again to prevent clumping.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or preferably overnight, until thick and pudding-like.
Serve chilled with keto-friendly berries if desired.

recipes.name: Creamy Broccoli Cheese Soup
recipes.description: A rich and comforting broccoli cheese soup that's quick to make and keto-friendly.
instructions: Sauté chopped onion (optional) in butter in a pot until softened.
Add broccoli florets and chicken or vegetable broth.
Bring to a simmer and cook until broccoli is tender (about 10-15 minutes).
Reduce heat, stir in heavy cream and shredded cheddar cheese until melted and smooth.
Do not boil.
Season with salt and pepper.
Use an immersion blender for a smoother consistency if desired.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad with Grilled Chicken
recipes.description: A classic Caesar salad made keto-friendly with grilled chicken and a creamy, sugar-free dressing.
instructions: Grill or pan-sear chicken breast until cooked through; slice.
Prepare Keto Caesar Dressing: Whisk together mayonnaise, grated Parmesan, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, minced garlic, and a dash of Worcestershire sauce (optional, check for sugar).
Season with salt and pepper.
Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with dressing.
Top with grilled chicken slices and extra Parmesan.
Add keto croutons (e.g., baked cheese crisps or pork rinds) if desired.
recipes.notes: Recipe 8 - Caesar Salad with Grilled Chicken

recipes.name: Lemon Herb Baked Salmon
recipes.description: Flaky and flavorful salmon baked with lemon and herbs, a perfect quick keto dinner.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Drizzle with olive oil or melted butter.
Season with salt, pepper, dried dill (or fresh), and garlic powder.
Top with thin lemon slices.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily.

recipes.name: Sheet Pan Sausage & Peppers
recipes.description: A simple and delicious one-pan meal with keto sausage, bell peppers, and onions.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Slice keto-friendly sausages (e.g., Italian sausage, bratwurst - check for low carbs/no sugar) into 1-inch pieces.
Slice bell peppers (various colors) and an onion into strips.
Toss sausage and vegetables with olive oil, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper on a large baking sheet.
Roast for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway, until sausages are browned and vegetables are tender-crisp.

recipes.name: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
recipes.description: A surprisingly rich and creamy chocolate mousse made with avocado – healthy and decadent!
instructions: Combine ripe avocado flesh, unsweetened cocoa powder, keto-friendly sweetener (to taste), a splash of unsweetened almond milk (or heavy cream), and vanilla extract in a blender or food processor.
Blend until completely smooth and creamy, scraping down sides as needed.
Taste and adjust sweetener if necessary.
Chill for at least 20-30 minutes before serving.
Garnish with keto chocolate shavings or berries if desired.
ingredients: Unsweetened almond milk or Heavy cream

recipes.name: No-Bake Peanut Butter Fat Bombs
recipes.description: Quick and easy energy bites perfect for satisfying sweet cravings on a keto diet.
instructions: In a bowl, mix together unsweetened natural peanut butter (check for no added sugar), softened butter or coconut oil, keto-friendly powdered sweetener, and a pinch of salt.
Stir until well combined and a dough-like consistency forms.
Roll into small balls (about 1 inch).
Place on a parchment-lined plate and refrigerate or freeze for at least 20-30 minutes until firm.
Store in the refrigerator or freezer.
recipes.notes: Recipe 12 - No-Bake Peanut Butter Fat Bombs

recipes.name: Classic Bulletproof Coffee
recipes.description: A creamy and energizing coffee blended with butter and MCT oil, a keto staple.
instructions: Brew 8-12 oz of hot coffee using your preferred method.
Combine hot coffee, 1-2 tablespoons of unsalted grass-fed butter, and 1-2 teaspoons of MCT oil (start with less if new to MCT oil) in a blender.
Blend for 20-30 seconds until frothy and emulsified.
Pour into a mug and enjoy immediately.

recipes.name: Refreshing Berry Smoothie
recipes.description: A quick and refreshing low-carb smoothie packed with berries and healthy fats.
instructions: Combine unsweetened almond milk, a handful of mixed keto-friendly berries (e.g., raspberries, strawberries, blueberries), a scoop of keto-friendly protein powder (optional), a tablespoon of MCT oil or a dollop of full-fat Greek yogurt (check carbs), and a few ice cubes in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add more almond milk if too thick or more ice if desired.
Sweeten with keto-friendly sweetener if needed.
ingredients: Optional: MCT oil or Full-fat Greek yogurt (plain, unsweetened)

recipes.name: Caprese Skewers
recipes.description: Classic Caprese salad flavors on a convenient skewer, perfect for a light keto snack.
instructions: Thread cherry tomatoes, small fresh mozzarella balls (bocconcini), and fresh basil leaves onto small skewers.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze (ensure keto-friendly/low sugar or omit).
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Bacon-Wrapped Jalapeño Poppers
recipes.description: Spicy jalapeños stuffed with cream cheese and wrapped in crispy bacon.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Halve jalapeños lengthwise and remove seeds (wear gloves!).
Mix softened cream cheese with shredded cheddar and garlic powder.
Fill jalapeño halves.
Wrap each stuffed jalapeño half with a slice of bacon, securing with a toothpick if needed.
Place on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until bacon is crispy and cheese is bubbly.

recipes.name: Guacamole with Celery Sticks
recipes.description: Creamy homemade guacamole served with crisp celery sticks for a healthy keto dip.
instructions: Mash ripe avocados in a bowl.
Stir in finely chopped red onion, minced jalapeño (optional), chopped cilantro, lime juice, and salt.
Mix well.
Taste and adjust seasonings if needed.
Serve immediately with celery sticks or other keto-friendly vegetable dippers.

recipes.name: Antipasto Skewers
recipes.description: A delightful mix of cured meats, cheeses, and olives on a skewer.
instructions: Thread various keto-friendly antipasto items onto skewers.
Suggestions: salami, prosciutto, provolone cubes, marinated artichoke hearts, olives, and mozzarella balls.
Drizzle lightly with olive oil and a sprinkle of Italian herbs if desired.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: Marinated artichoke hearts (check for low carbs)

recipes.name: Cheese Crisps (Chaffles variation)
recipes.description: Simple, crispy cheese snacks made easily in a mini waffle maker or oven.
instructions: Preheat mini waffle maker.
Alternatively, preheat oven to 375°F and line a baking sheet with parchment.
Place small piles of shredded cheddar or Parmesan cheese onto the waffle maker (or baking sheet).
Sprinkle with garlic powder or herbs if desired.
Cook in waffle maker until golden and crispy (2-3 minutes).
If baking, bake for 5-7 minutes until edges are browned.
Let cool slightly to crisp up.

recipes.name: Cucumber Bites with Smoked Salmon & Dill Cream Cheese
recipes.description: Cool cucumber slices topped with savory smoked salmon and a herby cream cheese spread.
instructions: Slice cucumber into 1/4-inch thick rounds.
Mix softened cream cheese with chopped fresh dill, a squeeze of lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread dill cream cheese on cucumber slices.
Top with small pieces of smoked salmon.
Garnish with extra dill if desired.
recipes.notes: Recipe 20 - Cucumber Bites with Smoked Salmon & Dill Cream Cheese

recipes.name: Stuffed Mushrooms with Sausage and Cheese
recipes.description: Savory mushrooms stuffed with a delicious mixture of keto sausage and cheese.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Clean mushrooms and remove stems; chop stems finely.
Cook keto sausage in a skillet, breaking it apart; drain excess fat.
Add chopped mushroom stems and minced garlic, cook until softened.
Stir in cream cheese, Parmesan cheese, and Italian seasoning.
Season with salt and pepper.
Fill mushroom caps with the sausage mixture.
Place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until mushrooms are tender and filling is bubbly.
recipes.notes: Recipe 21 - Stuffed Mushrooms with Sausage and Cheese

recipes.name: Prosciutto-Wrapped Asparagus
recipes.description: Tender asparagus spears wrapped in salty prosciutto, baked or pan-fried.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (or use a skillet).
Trim tough ends from asparagus spears.
Wrap each asparagus spear (or a small bundle of 2-3 spears) with a slice of prosciutto.
Place on a baking sheet.
Drizzle lightly with olive oil.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until prosciutto is crisp and asparagus is tender-crisp.
Alternatively, pan-fry in a little olive oil over medium heat until prosciutto is crisp.

recipes.name: Deviled Eggs
recipes.description: Classic deviled eggs made keto-friendly with sugar-free mayonnaise and savory seasonings.
instructions: Hard-boil eggs (6-8).
Cool, peel, and halve lengthwise.
Remove yolks and place in a bowl.
Mash yolks with a fork.
Stir in keto-friendly mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, a splash of apple cider vinegar (optional), salt, and pepper.
Mix until smooth and creamy.
Adjust seasonings to taste.
Spoon or pipe yolk mixture back into egg white halves.
Garnish with paprika or chopped chives.
ingredients: Optional: Paprika, Chives, Apple cider vinegar

recipes.name: Mini Bell Pepper Nachos
recipes.description: Colorful mini bell peppers used as a base for nacho toppings, a fun keto snack.
instructions: Halve mini bell peppers and remove seeds.
Arrange on a baking sheet.
Top with cooked ground beef (seasoned with taco seasoning), shredded cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese.
Bake at 375°F for 5-7 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve with keto-friendly toppings like sour cream, guacamole, or chopped cilantro.
ingredients: Optional toppings: Sour cream, Guacamole, Cilantro

recipes.name: Marinated Olives with Herbs and Lemon
recipes.description: A flavorful mix of olives marinated in olive oil, fresh herbs, and lemon zest.
instructions: Combine assorted keto-friendly olives (e.g., Kalamata, Castelvetrano, green olives) in a bowl.
Add extra virgin olive oil, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh thyme sprigs, strips of lemon zest, and a crushed garlic clove.
Stir gently to coat.
Let marinate for at least 30 minutes at room temperature (or longer in the fridge) to allow flavors to meld.
Serve with toothpicks.
recipes.notes: Recipe 25 - Marinated Olives with Herbs and Lemon

recipes.name: Ranch Dip with Veggie Sticks
recipes.description: Creamy homemade keto ranch dip perfect for serving with fresh vegetable sticks.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together sour cream (full-fat), keto-friendly mayonnaise, a splash of unsweetened almond milk (to thin if needed), dried dill, dried parsley, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
For a tangier flavor, add a teaspoon of apple cider vinegar or lemon juice.
Mix well.
Chill for at least 20 minutes for flavors to combine.
Serve with celery, cucumber, bell pepper sticks, or broccoli/cauliflower florets.
ingredients: Optional: Unsweetened almond milk, Apple cider vinegar
recipes.notes: Recipe 26 - Ranch Dip with Veggie Sticks

recipes.name: Cheese-Stuffed Mini Sweet Peppers
recipes.description: Sweet mini peppers filled with herbed cream cheese, served raw or baked.
instructions: Halve mini sweet peppers lengthwise and remove seeds.
Mix softened cream cheese with garlic powder, onion powder, chopped chives or parsley, salt, and pepper.
Fill pepper halves with the cream cheese mixture.
Serve as is for a crunchy snack, or bake at 375°F for 10-12 minutes until peppers are slightly softened and cheese is warm.

recipes.name: Salami and Cream Cheese Bites
recipes.description: Simple yet elegant bites of salami spread with cream cheese and an olive.
instructions: Lay out slices of salami.
Spread a small amount of softened cream cheese (can be herbed if desired) onto each salami slice.
Place a small pimento-stuffed olive or a piece of bell pepper in the center.
Fold the salami slice around the filling or roll it up.
Secure with a toothpick if needed.
Chill before serving.
recipes.notes: Recipe 28 - Salami and Cream Cheese Bites

recipes.name: Baked Avocado Fries
recipes.description: Creamy avocado slices coated in a keto-friendly 'breading' and baked until crispy.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Slice firm, ripe avocados into wedges.
Prepare breading station: one bowl with almond flour seasoned with salt, pepper, and paprika; another bowl with a beaten egg.
Dip avocado slices first in beaten egg, then dredge in the seasoned almond flour, ensuring they are fully coated.
Place on the prepared baking sheet in a single layer.
Spray lightly with cooking oil spray.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden brown and crispy.
Serve with keto dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Tuna Salad Celery Boats
recipes.description: Crisp celery sticks filled with a creamy keto tuna salad.
instructions: Drain canned tuna very well.
In a bowl, mix tuna with keto-friendly mayonnaise, finely chopped celery (for extra crunch), a little Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper.
Add chopped red onion or dill pickles (check for sugar) if desired.
Cut celery stalks into 3-4 inch pieces.
Fill celery 'boats' with the tuna salad.
Garnish with a sprinkle of paprika or fresh dill.
ingredients: Canned tuna (in water or oil, drained)
Optional: Red onion (chopped), Dill pickles (sugar-free, chopped)

recipes.name: Everything Bagel Seasoning Fat Bombs
recipes.description: Savory fat bombs with cream cheese and the delicious flavor of everything bagel seasoning.
instructions: Beat softened cream cheese with a hand mixer until smooth.
Stir in 1-2 tablespoons of everything bagel seasoning.
Optionally, stir in a small amount of shredded cheddar cheese for extra flavor.
Roll mixture into small 1-inch balls.
If too soft, chill for 15-20 minutes before rolling.
Store in the refrigerator.
Can be rolled in extra seasoning before chilling if desired.
recipes.notes: Recipe 31 - Everything Bagel Seasoning Fat Bombs

recipes.name: Trail Mix (Nut & Seed Based)
recipes.description: A customizable mix of keto-friendly nuts, seeds, and unsweetened coconut flakes.
instructions: In a bowl, combine a mix of your favorite keto nuts (e.g., almonds, pecans, walnuts, macadamia nuts).
Add keto-friendly seeds (e.g., pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, chia seeds).
Stir in unsweetened coconut flakes and optionally some sugar-free chocolate chips (e.g., Lily's).
Mix well.
Store in an airtight container.
Portion control is key as nuts are calorie-dense.

recipes.name: Smoked Salmon on Cucumber Rounds
recipes.description: Simple, elegant, and refreshing bites perfect for a light appetizer.
instructions: Slice a cucumber into 1/4-inch thick rounds.
Top each cucumber round with a small piece of smoked salmon.
Add a tiny dollop of cream cheese or a sprinkle of fresh dill and a squeeze of lemon if desired.
Season lightly with black pepper.
ingredients: Optional: Cream cheese, Fresh dill, Lemon juice
recipes.notes: Recipe 33 - Smoked Salmon on Cucumber Rounds

recipes.name: Spicy Chorizo Bites
recipes.description: Flavorful pan-fried keto-friendly chorizo, perfect for a quick, savory snack.
instructions: Slice cured keto-friendly chorizo (check for no added sugars) into 1/4-inch thick rounds.
Heat a skillet over medium heat (no oil needed if chorizo is fatty).
Pan-fry chorizo slices for 2-3 minutes per side, until lightly crisped and heated through.
Drain on paper towels.
Serve warm with toothpicks.

recipes.name: Olive Oil and Herb Marinated Feta
recipes.description: Cubes of feta cheese marinated in olive oil with herbs and spices.
instructions: Cut a block of feta cheese into 1/2-inch cubes.
Place feta cubes in a jar.
Add extra virgin olive oil to cover.
Stir in dried oregano, red pepper flakes (to taste), a strip of lemon zest, and a crushed garlic clove.
Seal the jar and let marinate in the refrigerator for at least a few hours, preferably overnight.
Bring to room temperature before serving.
recipes.notes: Recipe 35 - Olive Oil and Herb Marinated Feta

recipes.name: BLT Lettuce Wraps ( Style)
recipes.description: The classic BLT flavors served in a crisp lettuce wrap for a low-carb snack.
instructions: Cook bacon slices until crispy; crumble or cut into pieces.
Wash and dry large lettuce leaves (e.g., romaine, iceberg, or butter lettuce) to use as wraps.
Spread a thin layer of keto-friendly mayonnaise on each lettuce leaf.
Top with bacon pieces and tomato slices (use sparingly to keep carbs low).
Season with salt and pepper.
Fold or roll up to eat.

recipes.name: Seaweed Snacks (Nori Sheets)
recipes.description: Crispy, salty roasted seaweed sheets – a simple and very low-carb snack.
instructions: Purchase pre-packaged roasted seaweed snacks (nori sheets).
Ensure they are plain or seasoned with keto-friendly ingredients (e.g., sea salt, sesame oil, avoid sugar).
Enjoy directly from the package.
They are naturally low in carbs and calories.

recipes.name: Pickle Spears with Cream Cheese & Everything Seasoning
recipes.description: A crunchy and savory snack combining dill pickles with creamy, seasoned cream cheese.
instructions: Take dill pickle spears (ensure no added sugar) and pat them dry with a paper towel.
Spread a layer of softened full-fat cream cheese onto one side of each pickle spear.
Sprinkle generously with everything bagel seasoning.
Serve immediately or chill for later.
recipes.notes: Recipe 38 - Pickle Spears with Cream Cheese & Everything Seasoning

recipes.name: Mini Zucchini Pizzas
recipes.description: Zucchini rounds topped with keto pizza sauce, cheese, and mini pepperoni.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Slice zucchini into 1/4 to 1/2-inch thick rounds.
Place zucchini rounds on a baking sheet.
Top each with a small spoonful of keto-friendly pizza sauce (low sugar), a sprinkle of shredded mozzarella cheese, and a mini pepperoni slice (or other keto topping).
Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly and zucchini is tender-crisp.
Broil for a minute at the end for crispier toppings if desired.
ingredients: Mini pepperoni (or other keto pizza toppings)

recipes.name: Hard Boiled Eggs with Salt and Pepper
recipes.description: The simplest keto snack, perfectly portable and protein-packed.
instructions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water by about an inch.
Bring to a rolling boil, then cover the pot, remove from heat, and let stand for 10-12 minutes.
Drain hot water and transfer eggs to an ice bath to cool quickly and stop the cooking process.
Peel when cooled.
Serve whole or halved, seasoned with salt and pepper.
recipes.notes: Recipe 40 - Hard Boiled Eggs with Salt and Pepper

recipes.name: Parmesan Crusted Green Bean Fries
recipes.description: Fresh green beans coated in Parmesan and seasonings, baked until crispy.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Wash and trim fresh green beans.
In a bowl, toss green beans with olive oil.
In a separate shallow dish, combine grated Parmesan cheese, almond flour (optional, for extra crisp), garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
Dredge the oiled green beans in the Parmesan mixture, ensuring they are well coated.
Arrange in a single layer on the baking sheet.
Bake for 10-15 minutes, flipping once, until golden brown and crispy.
Serve with keto dip if desired.
recipes.notes: Recipe 41 - Parmesan Crusted Green Bean Fries

recipes.name: Savory Spiced Pecans
recipes.description: Pecans toasted with butter and savory spices for a quick and satisfying snack.
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F.
In a bowl, toss pecan halves with melted butter, smoked paprika, cumin, a pinch of cayenne (optional), garlic powder, and salt.
Spread in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 8-10 minutes, stirring once, until fragrant and lightly toasted.
Be careful not to burn.
Let cool completely before serving.

recipes.name: Breakfast Burrito Bowl
recipes.description: All the flavors of a breakfast burrito, without the tortilla, in a satisfying bowl.
instructions: Cook crumbled sausage or bacon until browned; drain fat.
Scramble eggs to your liking.
Assemble bowl: layer scrambled eggs, cooked meat, shredded cheddar cheese, avocado slices or guacamole, and a dollop of sour cream or keto-friendly salsa.

recipes.name: Almond Flour Pancakes with Berries
recipes.description: Light and fluffy keto pancakes served with fresh berries and keto syrup.
instructions: Whisk together almond flour, keto sweetener, baking powder, and a pinch of salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk eggs, unsweetened almond milk, and melted butter or coconut oil.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed (do not overmix).
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or non-stick pan over medium-low heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter per pancake.
Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through.
Serve with butter, keto-friendly syrup, and a few fresh berries.
ingredients: Butter or Coconut oil (melted, plus for cooking)
recipes.notes: Recipe 44 - Almond Flour Pancakes with Berries

recipes.name: Spinach and Feta Omelette
recipes.description: A classic savory omelette packed with spinach and salty feta cheese.
instructions: Whisk 2-3 eggs with a splash of water or unsweetened almond milk, salt, and pepper.
Heat butter or olive oil in a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Add fresh spinach and cook until wilted.
Pour egg mixture over spinach.
Cook until edges are set.
Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese over one half of the omelette.
Fold the other half over.
Cook for another minute until cheese is slightly melted and omelette is cooked through.
Slide onto a plate.
ingredients: Optional: Splash of water or almond milk

recipes.name: Sausage and Egg Breakfast Bake
recipes.description: A simple make-ahead breakfast casserole with sausage, eggs, and cheese.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Grease a small baking dish.
Cook keto-friendly breakfast sausage, crumbling it, until browned; drain fat.
Spread sausage in the prepared dish.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with heavy cream, salt, pepper, and a pinch of garlic powder.
Pour egg mixture over the sausage.
Sprinkle generously with shredded cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until set and lightly golden.
Let cool slightly before slicing.
recipes.notes: Recipe 46 - Sausage and Egg Breakfast Bake

recipes.name: Cream Cheese Pancakes ()
recipes.description: Delicate and slightly sweet keto pancakes made primarily with cream cheese and eggs.
instructions: In a blender, combine softened full-fat cream cheese, eggs, a small amount of keto-friendly sweetener, a pinch of cinnamon (optional), and vanilla extract.
Blend until completely smooth.
Heat a lightly buttered non-stick skillet or griddle over medium-low heat.
Pour small circles of batter (about 2-3 tablespoons each).
These are thinner than traditional pancakes.
Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until golden brown and set.
Handle gently as they are delicate.
Serve with keto toppings.

recipes.name: Smoked Salmon and Cream Cheese Chaffle
recipes.description: A savory chaffle topped with cream cheese, smoked salmon, and capers.
instructions: Make basic chaffles: Whisk 1 egg with 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella or cheddar cheese.
Cook in a preheated mini waffle maker until crispy.
Spread a layer of cream cheese on the warm chaffle.
Top with slices of smoked salmon.
Garnish with capers, fresh dill, and a squeeze of lemon juice if desired.
ingredients: Optional: Capers, Fresh dill, Lemon juice
recipes.notes: Recipe 48 - Smoked Salmon and Cream Cheese Chaffle

recipes.name: 90-Second Bread (Mug Bread)
recipes.description: A super quick single-serving keto bread made in the microwave.
instructions: In a microwave-safe mug or ramekin, melt 1 tablespoon of butter.
Add almond flour (or coconut flour - adjust liquid if using), one egg, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, and a pinch of salt.
Mix well until smooth.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds (or until cooked through - time may vary).
Let cool slightly, then carefully remove from mug.
Can be sliced and toasted.

recipes.name: Granola with Nuts and Seeds
recipes.description: Crunchy, homemade keto granola perfect with unsweetened almond milk or keto yogurt.
instructions: Preheat oven to 300°F.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a bowl, combine mixed chopped nuts (almonds, pecans, walnuts), seeds (pumpkin, sunflower, chia, flax), unsweetened coconut flakes, keto-friendly sweetener, and a pinch of cinnamon.
Stir in melted coconut oil or butter and a splash of vanilla extract until everything is lightly coated.
Spread mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway, until golden brown and fragrant.
Let cool completely on the baking sheet to crisp up.
Store in an airtight container.
recipes.notes: Recipe 50 - Granola with Nuts and Seeds

recipes.name: Bacon and Eggs, Classic
recipes.description: The quintessential simple keto breakfast: crispy bacon and perfectly cooked eggs.
instructions: Cook bacon slices in a skillet over medium heat until desired crispiness.
Remove bacon and drain on paper towels, reserving some bacon fat in the skillet if desired.
Cook eggs in the same skillet (or a clean one with butter) to your preference: fried, scrambled, or poached.
Season eggs with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately with the crispy bacon.
ingredients: Optional: Butter (if not using bacon fat)

recipes.name: Yogurt with Berries and Toasted Almonds
recipes.description: Plain full-fat Greek yogurt or keto-friendly yogurt alternative topped with low-carb berries and crunchy almonds.
instructions: Spoon plain, unsweetened full-fat Greek yogurt (check carb count) or a keto-friendly yogurt alternative into a bowl.
Top with a small handful of mixed keto-friendly berries (raspberries, blueberries, strawberries).
Sprinkle with slivered or chopped toasted almonds.
Drizzle with a keto-friendly sweetener or a few drops of vanilla extract if desired.
ingredients: Plain full-fat Greek yogurt (or keto yogurt alternative)
recipes.notes: Recipe 52 - Yogurt with Berries and Toasted Almonds

recipes.name: Steak and Eggs Style
recipes.description: A hearty and protein-packed keto breakfast featuring pan-seared steak and eggs.
instructions: Season a small steak (e.g., sirloin, ribeye, or leftover steak) with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Heat butter or avocado oil in a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear steak for 3-5 minutes per side, or to desired doneness.
Let rest for a few minutes, then slice.
In the same or another skillet, cook 1-2 eggs to your preference (fried or scrambled).
Serve sliced steak alongside the eggs.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chia Seed Pudding
recipes.description: A rich and creamy chocolate pudding made with chia seeds, perfect for a make-ahead breakfast or dessert.
instructions: In a jar or bowl, combine unsweetened almond milk (or coconut milk), chia seeds, unsweetened cocoa powder, keto-friendly sweetener to taste, and a splash of vanilla extract.
Whisk very well to combine, ensuring no clumps of cocoa powder remain.
Let sit for 5-10 minutes, then whisk again thoroughly.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 3-4 hours, or preferably overnight, until thick and pudding-like.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Ham and Cheese Egg Cups
recipes.description: Easy grab-and-go breakfast cups made with ham, eggs, and cheese baked in a muffin tin.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Grease a muffin tin.
Press a slice of deli ham into each muffin cup to form a liner.
Crack an egg into each ham cup.
Season with salt and pepper.
Sprinkle with shredded cheddar or your favorite cheese.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until egg whites are set and yolks are cooked to your liking.
Let cool slightly before removing from tin.
ingredients: Deli ham slices (check for low sugar)
recipes.notes: Recipe 55 - Ham and Cheese Egg Cups

recipes.name: Coffee Smoothie
recipes.description: A creamy and energizing smoothie that combines coffee with healthy keto fats.
instructions: Brew a strong cup of coffee and let it cool, or use chilled leftover coffee or cold brew concentrate.

In a blender, combine chilled coffee, unsweetened almond milk, a scoop of keto-friendly protein powder (vanilla or chocolate), a tablespoon of MCT oil or coconut oil, a few ice cubes, and keto-friendly sweetener to taste.
Blend until smooth and frothy.
Add a pinch of cinnamon or cocoa powder if desired.

recipes.name: Frittata with Spinach and Mushrooms
recipes.description: A versatile baked egg dish packed with vegetables and cheese.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
In an oven-safe skillet (e.g., cast iron), sauté sliced mushrooms and chopped onion (optional) in butter or olive oil until softened.
Add fresh spinach and cook until wilted.
In a bowl, whisk eggs (6-8) with heavy cream or unsweetened almond milk, salt, pepper, and grated Parmesan cheese.
Pour egg mixture over the vegetables in the skillet.
Sprinkle with more cheese if desired (e.g., feta or mozzarella).
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until frittata is set and lightly golden.
Let cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.
ingredients: Heavy cream or Unsweetened almond milk
Optional: Onion, Feta or Mozzarella cheese
recipes.notes: Recipe 57 - Frittata with Spinach and Mushrooms

recipes.name: Sausage Patties with Fried Eggs
recipes.description: Homemade or store-bought keto sausage patties served with classic fried eggs.
instructions: Form keto-friendly ground sausage into patties (or use pre-made keto sausage patties - check ingredients for no added sugar/fillers).
Cook sausage patties in a skillet over medium heat until browned and cooked through, about 4-5 minutes per side.
Remove and keep warm.
In the same skillet (or a clean one with butter), fry 1-2 eggs per serving to your desired doneness (sunny-side up, over easy, etc.).
Serve sausage patties alongside fried eggs.
Season eggs with salt and pepper.
recipes.notes: Recipe 58 - Sausage Patties with Fried Eggs

recipes.name: Zucchini Fritters with Poached Egg
recipes.description: Savory zucchini fritters topped with a perfectly poached egg for a satisfying keto breakfast.
instructions: Grate zucchini and squeeze out as much excess moisture as possible using a clean kitchen towel or cheesecloth.
In a bowl, combine grated zucchini, an egg, a tablespoon or two of almond flour, grated Parmesan cheese, chopped chives or green onion, salt, and pepper.
Mix well.
Heat coconut oil or avocado oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Drop spoonfuls of the zucchini mixture into the hot skillet, flattening slightly to form fritters.
Cook for 3-4 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through.
While fritters cook, poach eggs.
Serve fritters topped with a poached egg and a sprinkle of red pepper flakes if desired.
ingredients: Coconut oil or Avocado oil (for frying)
recipes.notes: Recipe 59 - Zucchini Fritters with Poached Egg

recipes.name: No-Oat Oatmeal (N'oatmeal)
recipes.description: A warm and comforting keto-friendly oatmeal substitute made with seeds and nuts.
instructions: In a small saucepan, combine a mix of flaxseed meal, chia seeds, hemp hearts, and a small amount of chopped nuts (e.g., pecans or walnuts).
Add unsweetened almond milk or coconut milk and a pinch of salt.
Stir to combine.
Cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, for 5-7 minutes, or until thickened to desired consistency.
Stir in keto-friendly sweetener to taste, a splash of vanilla extract, and a pat of butter or a drizzle of MCT oil.
Serve warm with keto toppings like berries or cinnamon.
ingredients: Unsweetened almond milk or Coconut milk
Optional: Chopped nuts, Butter/MCT oil, Cinnamon, Berries

recipes.name: Breakfast Pizza on Cauliflower Crust
recipes.description: A fun and savory breakfast pizza using a keto-friendly cauliflower crust.
instructions: Prepare or purchase a pre-made keto cauliflower pizza crust.
Preheat oven according to crust instructions or to 400°F.
Scramble eggs (2-3 per serving).
Cook breakfast sausage or bacon until crispy.
Spread a thin layer of sugar-free marinara or alfredo sauce (optional) on the cauliflower crust.
Top with scrambled eggs, cooked sausage/bacon, and shredded mozzarella or cheddar cheese.
Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly and crust is heated through.
Garnish with fresh parsley or chives if desired.
ingredients: Keto cauliflower pizza crust (pre-made or homemade)
Breakfast sausage or Bacon (cooked and crumbled)
Optional: Sugar-free marinara or Alfredo sauce, Fresh parsley/chives
recipes.notes: Recipe 61 - Breakfast Pizza on Cauliflower Crust

recipes.name: Cinnamon French Toast (Chaffle Style)
recipes.description: Keto-friendly French toast made using the chaffle method, with cinnamon and vanilla.
instructions: Make basic chaffles: Whisk 1 egg with 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella (or a neutral cheese like provolone).
Add a splash of unsweetened almond milk, 1/2 tsp cinnamon, a few drops of vanilla extract, and keto sweetener to taste.
Cook in a preheated mini waffle maker until golden and crispy.
Serve warm chaffles topped with butter and keto-friendly maple syrup.
Dust with more cinnamon if desired.

recipes.name: Green Smoothie with Avocado and Spinach
recipes.description: A nutrient-packed green smoothie with healthy fats from avocado and loads of spinach.
instructions: In a blender, combine unsweetened almond milk (or coconut water - check carbs), a handful of fresh spinach, 1/4 to 1/2 ripe avocado, a scoop of keto-friendly vanilla protein powder (optional), a squeeze of lemon or lime juice (to brighten flavor), and a few ice cubes.
Blend until completely smooth and creamy.
Add keto-friendly sweetener if needed.
Pour into a glass and enjoy immediately.
ingredients: Unsweetened almond milk (or low-carb coconut water)
Optional: Keto-friendly vanilla protein powder, Lemon/lime juice, Keto-friendly sweetener
recipes.notes: Recipe 63 - Green Smoothie with Avocado and Spinach

recipes.name: Cloud Eggs (Egg Nests)
recipes.description: Fluffy baked egg whites forming a 'cloud' around a perfectly cooked yolk.
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Separate egg whites from yolks (keeping yolks intact in separate small bowls or eggshells).
Beat egg whites with a pinch of salt until stiff peaks form.
Gently fold in grated Parmesan cheese and chopped chives or bacon bits if desired.
Spoon mounds of the whipped egg whites onto the prepared baking sheet, creating a small well in the center of each mound.
Bake egg white 'clouds' for 3 minutes.
Carefully slide an egg yolk into the well of each cloud.
Bake for another 3-4 minutes, or until yolks are set to your liking but still runny.
Serve immediately.
ingredients: Optional: Parmesan cheese (grated), Chives (chopped), Cooked bacon bits

recipes.name: Egg Drop Soup
recipes.description: A quick, comforting, and very low-carb version of the classic egg drop soup.
instructions: Bring chicken or bone broth to a simmer in a saucepan.
Season with ginger powder, garlic powder, and a dash of soy sauce (or coconut aminos for strict keto).
Slowly drizzle in lightly beaten eggs while gently stirring the broth in one direction to create ribbons.
Garnish with chopped green onions.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Big Mac Salad ()
recipes.description: All the flavors of a Big Mac in a satisfying, keto-friendly salad form.
instructions: Cook ground beef until browned; drain fat.
Season with salt and pepper.
Prepare dressing: Mix keto-friendly mayonnaise, sugar-free ketchup or tomato paste, finely chopped pickles (sugar-free), a splash of pickle juice or vinegar, onion powder, and paprika.
Assemble salad: Layer chopped romaine lettuce, cooked ground beef, shredded cheddar cheese, and chopped pickles.
Drizzle with the prepared dressing.
Top with sesame seeds if desired.

recipes.name: Creamy Tomato and Basil Soup ()
recipes.description: A smooth and flavorful keto tomato soup with fresh basil.
instructions: Sauté chopped onion (optional) and minced garlic in olive oil or butter in a pot until softened.
Add canned crushed tomatoes (check for no added sugar), vegetable or chicken broth, and dried oregano.
Bring to a simmer.
Cook for 10-15 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and fresh chopped basil.
Use an immersion blender to blend until smooth.
Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of keto-friendly sweetener to balance acidity if needed.
Serve warm.
recipes.notes: Recipe 67 - Creamy Tomato and Basil Soup ()

recipes.name: Cobb Salad
recipes.description: A hearty and classic Cobb salad made fully keto with delicious toppings and dressing.
instructions: Prepare components: Cook and chop chicken breast, cook and crumble bacon, hard-boil and chop eggs.
Arrange a bed of mixed greens (romaine, iceberg) on a plate or in a bowl.
Neatly arrange rows of chopped chicken, crumbled bacon, chopped hard-boiled eggs, diced avocado, chopped tomatoes (use sparingly), and crumbled blue cheese (or cheddar) over the greens.
Drizzle with a keto-friendly ranch or blue cheese dressing.
ingredients: Blue cheese or Cheddar cheese (crumbled or shredded)
Keto-friendly Ranch or Blue cheese dressing

recipes.name: Simple Cucumber and Dill Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and light salad with thinly sliced cucumbers and fresh dill in a creamy dressing.
instructions: Thinly slice cucumbers (peeled or unpeeled).
Optionally, salt them lightly, let sit for 15 minutes, then pat dry to remove excess water.

In a bowl, whisk together sour cream (full-fat) or full-fat Greek yogurt, a splash of white vinegar or lemon juice, chopped fresh dill, a pinch of keto-friendly sweetener (optional), salt, and pepper.
Add cucumber slices to the dressing and toss gently to coat.
Chill for at least 15-20 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.
ingredients: Sour cream or Full-fat Greek yogurt
recipes.notes: Recipe 69 - Simple Cucumber and Dill Salad

recipes.name: Zuppa Toscana (Sausage and Kale Soup)
recipes.description: A keto version of the popular Italian sausage, kale, and 'potato' soup, using cauliflower as a substitute.
instructions: Cook crumbled Italian sausage (keto-friendly) in a large pot or Dutch oven until browned; drain excess fat.
Add chopped onion (optional) and minced garlic, cook until softened.
Add chicken broth and cauliflower florets (cut into small, bite-sized pieces).
Bring to a simmer and cook until cauliflower is tender (about 10-15 minutes).
Stir in chopped kale and cook until wilted.
Reduce heat and stir in heavy cream.
Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes to taste.
Do not boil after adding cream.
Serve hot, garnished with Parmesan if desired.
recipes.notes: Recipe 70 - Zuppa Toscana (Sausage and Kale Soup)

recipes.name: Avocado Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A creamy twist on the classic Caprese salad, with added avocado for healthy fats.
instructions: Dice ripe avocados.
Slice cherry or grape tomatoes in half.
Cube or use small fresh mozzarella balls (bocconcini).
Gently combine avocado, tomatoes, and mozzarella in a bowl.
Chiffonade or roughly chop fresh basil leaves and add to the salad.
Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil.
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Toss gently.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Creamy Mushroom Soup ()
recipes.description: A rich and savory keto cream of mushroom soup, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Melt butter in a pot over medium heat.
Add sliced mushrooms (cremini, button, or mixed) and chopped onion (optional).
Cook until mushrooms are browned and liquid has evaporated.
Stir in minced garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
Sprinkle with a small amount of almond flour or xanthan gum (optional, for thickening) and stir for 1 minute.
Gradually whisk in chicken or vegetable broth.
Bring to a simmer.
Reduce heat, stir in heavy cream, dried thyme, salt, and pepper.
Simmer gently for 5-10 minutes.
For a smoother soup, use an immersion blender.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
ingredients: Optional: Onion (chopped), Almond flour or Xanthan gum, Fresh parsley

recipes.name: Taco Salad
recipes.description: A flavorful and satisfying salad with all your favorite taco fillings, minus the shell.
instructions: Cook ground beef or turkey with keto-friendly taco seasoning until browned; drain fat.
Chop romaine lettuce and place in a large bowl or on individual plates.
Top lettuce with seasoned meat, shredded cheddar cheese, diced tomatoes (sparingly), sliced black olives (optional), and diced avocado.
Serve with sour cream, keto-friendly salsa, and guacamole.
Crushed pork rinds can be used for a crunchy topping.
ingredients: Optional: Black olives, Sour cream, Keto salsa, Guacamole, Pork rinds

recipes.name: Spinach Salad with Bacon and Egg ()
recipes.description: A warm spinach salad with crispy bacon, hard-boiled eggs, and a simple keto vinaigrette.
instructions: Cook bacon slices until crispy; crumble and reserve bacon fat.
Hard-boil eggs and slice or chop.
Prepare dressing: Whisk together reserved warm bacon fat (2-3 tbsp), red wine vinegar or apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, and a pinch of keto-friendly sweetener (optional).
Season with salt and pepper.
Place fresh spinach in a large bowl.
Add sliced mushrooms and red onion (thinly sliced, optional) if desired.
Pour warm dressing over spinach and toss to coat lightly (spinach will wilt slightly).
Top with crumbled bacon and chopped hard-boiled eggs.
Serve immediately.
ingredients: Red wine vinegar or Apple cider vinegar
Optional: Mushrooms (sliced), Red onion (thinly sliced), Keto-friendly sweetener
recipes.notes: Recipe 74 - Spinach Salad with Bacon and Egg ()

recipes.name: Chicken Noodle-less Soup
recipes.description: Comforting chicken soup with vegetables, using zucchini noodles or shirataki noodles for a keto version.
instructions: Sauté chopped celery, carrots (use sparingly for keto), and onion (optional) in olive oil or butter in a large pot until softened.
Add minced garlic.
Add chicken broth and cooked, shredded or diced chicken breast or thighs.
Bring to a simmer.
Season with salt, pepper, and dried herbs like thyme and rosemary.
Add zucchini noodles (spiralized zucchini) or rinsed shirataki noodles during the last 5-7 minutes of cooking, just until tender.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Broccoli Slaw Salad ()
recipes.description: A crunchy and tangy keto broccoli slaw, perfect as a side dish.
instructions: Use pre-shredded broccoli slaw mix (broccoli, carrots, cabbage - check carb count for carrots) or shred your own broccoli stems and cabbage.
Prepare dressing: Whisk together keto-friendly mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, keto-friendly sweetener to taste, celery seeds (optional), salt, and pepper.
In a large bowl, combine broccoli slaw mix with chopped red onion (optional) and sunflower seeds or chopped nuts (e.g., pecans, walnuts) for crunch.
Pour dressing over slaw and toss to combine thoroughly.
Chill for at least 20-30 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.
ingredients: Optional: Red onion (chopped), Sunflower seeds or Chopped nuts, Celery seeds

recipes.name: Greek Salad with Feta
recipes.description: A refreshing salad with classic Greek flavors: cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta, and a lemon-herb dressing.
instructions: Chop cucumbers, bell peppers (any color), and tomatoes (use sparingly).
Thinly slice red onion.
Combine chopped vegetables in a salad bowl.
Add Kalamata olives and crumbled feta cheese.
Prepare dressing: Whisk together extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, dried oregano, minced garlic (optional), salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss gently.
Garnish with fresh parsley or mint if desired.
ingredients: Optional: Garlic (minced), Fresh parsley or Mint

recipes.name: Roasted Cauliflower and Bacon Soup ()
recipes.description: A creamy and flavorful soup made with roasted cauliflower and crispy bacon.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Toss cauliflower florets with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast on a baking sheet for 20-25 minutes, until tender and slightly caramelized.
Cook bacon slices until crispy; crumble and set aside, reserving some bacon fat.
In a pot, sauté chopped onion (optional) and garlic in reserved bacon fat or butter until softened.
Add roasted cauliflower and chicken broth.
Bring to a simmer.
Use an immersion blender to blend the soup until smooth.
Stir in heavy cream and most of the crumbled bacon (save some for garnish).
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Heat through.
Serve topped with remaining bacon and chives.
recipes.notes: Recipe 78 - Roasted Cauliflower and Bacon Soup ()

recipes.name: Italian Chopped Salad ()
recipes.description: A hearty chopped salad with Italian meats, cheeses, and a zesty vinaigrette.
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce.
Dice keto-friendly Italian meats like salami, pepperoni, and ham.
Cube provolone or mozzarella cheese.
Dice bell peppers and red onion.
Include olives and pepperoncini (optional).
Combine all chopped ingredients in a large salad bowl.
Prepare dressing: Whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, Dijon mustard, dried oregano, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss well to combine.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Asparagus Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette
recipes.description: A bright and fresh salad featuring blanched asparagus with a simple lemon dressing.
instructions: Blanch or steam asparagus spears until tender-crisp (about 2-4 minutes).
Immediately transfer to an ice bath to stop cooking and retain color; drain well.
Cut into bite-sized pieces.
Prepare dressing: Whisk together extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest (optional), Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper.
In a bowl, combine blanched asparagus with thinly sliced red onion (optional) and toasted slivered almonds or pine nuts for crunch.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss gently.
Garnish with grated Parmesan cheese if desired.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: Optional: Red onion (thinly sliced), Toasted slivered almonds or Pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, Lemon zest
recipes.notes: Recipe 80 - Asparagus Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette

recipes.name: Chilled Avocado Soup ()
recipes.description: A creamy, refreshing, and no-cook keto soup perfect for warm days.
instructions: Combine ripe avocado flesh, vegetable broth or bone broth (chilled), heavy cream or full-fat coconut milk, lime or lemon juice, chopped cilantro or parsley, a small clove of garlic (optional), and salt in a blender.
Blend until completely smooth and creamy.
Add more broth or water to reach desired consistency if too thick.
Taste and adjust seasonings (salt, lime/lemon juice).
Chill thoroughly for at least 30 minutes before serving.
Garnish with a drizzle of olive oil, a sprinkle of paprika, or fresh herbs.
ingredients: Heavy cream or Full-fat coconut milk
Optional: Garlic clove, Olive oil, Paprika

recipes.name: Simple Arugula Salad with Parmesan and Lemon
recipes.description: A peppery arugula salad with shaved Parmesan and a zesty lemon vinaigrette.
instructions: Place fresh arugula in a salad bowl.
Prepare dressing: Whisk together extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, salt, and freshly ground black pepper.
Pour dressing over arugula and toss gently to coat.
Top with shaved Parmesan cheese (using a vegetable peeler).
Add toasted pine nuts or walnuts for extra crunch if desired.
Serve immediately.
ingredients: Optional: Toasted pine nuts or Walnuts
recipes.notes: Recipe 82 - Simple Arugula Salad with Parmesan and Lemon

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.description: A rich and creamy keto version of the classic Indian butter chicken.
instructions: Marinate chicken pieces (thighs or breast) in yogurt (check carbs, or use coconut cream), ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, garam masala, and chili powder for at least 20 minutes.
Sear chicken in ghee or butter until browned.
Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté chopped onion (optional) until soft.
Add more ginger-garlic paste, tomato puree (low sugar), and spices (coriander, cumin, turmeric, garam masala).
Cook until fragrant.
Stir in heavy cream and a touch of keto-friendly sweetener.
Add cooked chicken back to the sauce.
Simmer until chicken is cooked through and sauce has thickened.
Garnish with fresh cilantro.
Serve with cauliflower rice.
ingredients: Optional: Onion, Keto-friendly sweetener, Fresh cilantro

recipes.name: Shepherd's Pie with Cauliflower Mash
recipes.description: Comforting shepherd's pie with a savory meat filling topped with creamy cauliflower mash.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Cook ground beef or lamb with chopped onion (optional), carrots (sparingly), and celery until browned.
Drain fat.
Stir in beef broth, Worcestershire sauce (keto-friendly), tomato paste (low sugar), thyme, and rosemary.
Simmer until sauce thickens slightly.
Prepare cauliflower mash: Steam or boil cauliflower florets until very tender.
Drain well.
Mash with butter, heavy cream, salt, pepper, and garlic powder until smooth.
Spread meat mixture in a baking dish.
Top evenly with cauliflower mash.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until bubbly and top is lightly golden.
Broil for a few minutes at the end if desired.
recipes.notes: Recipe 84 - Shepherd's Pie with Cauliflower Mash

recipes.name: Baked Cod with Asparagus and Cherry Tomatoes
recipes.description: A light and healthy one-pan meal featuring flaky cod, tender asparagus, and sweet cherry tomatoes.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
On a baking sheet, toss asparagus spears and cherry tomatoes (halved) with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Place cod fillets amongst the vegetables.
Drizzle cod with olive oil or melted butter, season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and dried oregano or parsley.
Top with lemon slices.
Bake for 12-15 minutes (or until cod is cooked through and flakes easily, and vegetables are tender-roasted).
recipes.notes: Recipe 85 - Baked Cod with Asparagus and Cherry Tomatoes

recipes.name: Meatloaf with Sugar-Free Glaze
recipes.description: A classic meatloaf recipe made keto-friendly with a delicious sugar-free glaze.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.

In a large bowl, combine ground beef (or a mix of beef and pork), crushed pork rinds or almond flour (as binder), a beaten egg, finely chopped onion (optional), minced garlic, Worcestershire sauce (keto-friendly), salt, and pepper.
Mix gently until just combined (do not overmix).
Form mixture into a loaf shape and place in a loaf pan or on a baking sheet.
Prepare glaze: Mix sugar-free ketchup or tomato paste with a little apple cider vinegar and keto-friendly sweetener.
Spread half the glaze over the meatloaf.
Bake for 45-50 minutes.
Spread remaining glaze over the top and bake for another 10-15 minutes, or until cooked through (internal temperature reaches 160°F).
Let rest before slicing.
ingredients: Ground beef (or mix with ground pork)
Crushed pork rinds or Almond flour

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-fry with Broccoli and Bell Peppers ()
recipes.description: A quick and flavorful chicken stir-fry packed with keto-friendly vegetables.
instructions: Slice chicken breast or thighs into thin strips.
Toss with soy sauce (or coconut aminos), ginger-garlic paste, and a pinch of white pepper.
Heat avocado oil or sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through.
Remove chicken and set aside.
Add broccoli florets and sliced bell peppers to the skillet.
Stir-fry for 3-5 minutes until tender-crisp.
Add more soy sauce/coconut aminos and a splash of chicken broth if needed.
Return chicken to the skillet.
Toss to combine and heat through.
Garnish with sesame seeds or chopped green onions.
Serve with cauliflower rice.
ingredients: Optional: White pepper, Chicken broth, Sesame seeds, Green onions
recipes.notes: Recipe 87 - Chicken Stir-fry with Broccoli and Bell Peppers ()

recipes.name: Pork Chops with Creamy Mushroom Sauce
recipes.description: Juicy pan-seared pork chops smothered in a rich and creamy mushroom sauce.
instructions: Season pork chops with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Heat olive oil or butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear pork chops for 4-5 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through.
Remove from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add more butter if needed.
Sauté sliced mushrooms until browned.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Deglaze pan with a splash of chicken broth or white wine (optional).
Stir in heavy cream and a touch of Dijon mustard.
Simmer until sauce thickens slightly.
Season with salt, pepper, and fresh parsley or thyme.
Return pork chops to the skillet, spoon sauce over them, and heat through.
recipes.notes: Recipe 88 - Pork Chops with Creamy Mushroom Sauce

recipes.name: Lasagna with Zucchini Noodles
recipes.description: A low-carb lasagna using zucchini slices instead of pasta, layered with meat sauce and cheese.
instructions: Prepare meat sauce: Brown ground beef with onion (optional) and garlic.
Drain fat.
Stir in sugar-free marinara sauce and Italian herbs; simmer.
Thinly slice zucchini lengthwise into 'noodles' using a mandoline or sharp knife.
Lightly salt zucchini slices, let sit for 10-15 minutes to draw out moisture, then pat dry with paper towels.
Prepare cheese filling: Mix ricotta cheese (check carbs) with a beaten egg, grated Parmesan cheese, and chopped fresh parsley.
Season with salt and pepper.
Assemble lasagna in a baking dish: Layer zucchini noodles, meat sauce, cheese filling, and shredded mozzarella cheese.
Repeat layers.
End with a layer of mozzarella.
Bake at 375°F for 30-40 minutes, or until bubbly and cheese is golden.
Let rest before slicing.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi with Zucchini Noodles ()
recipes.description: Classic shrimp scampi flavors served over low-carb zucchini noodles.
instructions: Prepare zucchini noodles (spiralized zucchini).
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes (optional); cook until fragrant (about 1 minute).
Add shrimp and cook until pink and opaque (about 2-3 minutes per side).
Do not overcook.
Remove shrimp from skillet.
Add a splash of chicken broth or dry white wine (optional) to the skillet, scraping up any browned bits.
Stir in lemon juice and fresh chopped parsley.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add zucchini noodles to the skillet and toss to coat with the sauce, cooking for 1-2 minutes until just tender.
Return shrimp to the skillet and toss to combine.
Serve immediately, garnished with Parmesan if desired.
ingredients: Optional: Red pepper flakes, Chicken broth or Dry white wine, Parmesan cheese
recipes.notes: Recipe 90 - Shrimp Scampi with Zucchini Noodles ()

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Ground Turkey
recipes.description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with a savory mixture of ground turkey, cauliflower rice, and cheese.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Halve bell peppers (any color) lengthwise and remove seeds.
Cook ground turkey with chopped onion (optional) and garlic until browned.
Drain fat.
Stir in riced cauliflower, sugar-free tomato sauce or diced tomatoes (check carbs), Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Fill bell pepper halves with the turkey mixture.
Place in a baking dish (add a little water to the bottom of the dish to prevent sticking).
Top with shredded mozzarella or cheddar cheese.
Bake for 25-35 minutes, or until peppers are tender and filling is heated through and cheese is bubbly.
ingredients: Sugar-free tomato sauce or Diced tomatoes (low-carb)
recipes.notes: Recipe 91 - Stuffed Bell Peppers with Ground Turkey

recipes.name: Pan-Seared Scallops with Lemon Butter Sauce
recipes.description: Tender and perfectly seared scallops in a simple yet elegant lemon butter sauce.
instructions: Pat large sea scallops very dry with paper towels.
Season with salt and pepper.
Heat butter and a little olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Add scallops in a single layer (do not overcrowd; cook in batches if needed).
Sear for 5-2 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through.
Remove scallops and set aside.
Reduce heat to low.
Add minced garlic to the skillet and cook for 30 seconds.
Deglaze with a splash of chicken broth or dry white wine (optional).
Stir in fresh lemon juice and more butter.
Whisk until sauce is smooth.
Return scallops to the pan, spoon sauce over them.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
Serve immediately.
ingredients: Optional: Chicken broth or Dry white wine
recipes.notes: Recipe 92 - Pan-Seared Scallops with Lemon Butter Sauce

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-fry
recipes.description: A quick and easy keto version of the classic beef and broccoli.
instructions: Thinly slice beef steak (e.g., flank, sirloin) against the grain.
Toss with soy sauce (or coconut aminos), minced ginger, and garlic.
Heat avocado oil or sesame oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add beef slices and stir-fry until browned.
Remove beef and set aside.
Add broccoli florets to the wok with a splash of water or beef broth.
Cover and steam for 2-3 minutes until tender-crisp.
Return beef to the wok.
Add more soy sauce/coconut aminos and a pinch of xanthan gum (optional, to thicken sauce if desired, dissolved in a little water).
Stir-fry for another minute until sauce thickens slightly.
Garnish with sesame seeds.
ingredients: Optional: Beef broth, Xanthan gum, Sesame seeds

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo with Zucchini Noodles
recipes.description: Creamy keto chicken Alfredo served over low-carb zucchini noodles.
instructions: Cook chicken breast (grilled, baked, or pan-seared) and slice or dice.
Prepare zucchini noodles (spiralized).
Make Alfredo sauce: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Whisk in heavy cream and bring to a gentle simmer.
Reduce heat and stir in grated Parmesan cheese until melted and sauce is smooth.
Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of nutmeg (optional).
Do not boil.
Gently warm zucchini noodles (sauté briefly in butter or microwave for 1-2 minutes – do not overcook or they become watery).
Combine cooked chicken and Alfredo sauce.
Serve over zucchini noodles.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
recipes.notes: Recipe 94 - Chicken Alfredo with Zucchini Noodles

recipes.name: Spicy Sausage and Cabbage Stir-fry
recipes.description: A quick, budget-friendly, and flavorful stir-fry with keto sausage and shredded cabbage.
instructions: Slice keto-friendly smoked sausage (e.g., andouille, kielbasa - check for low carbs) into rounds.
Shred or thinly slice cabbage.
Heat avocado oil or bacon grease in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add sausage slices and cook until lightly browned.
Add shredded cabbage, sliced onion (optional), and bell pepper strips (optional) to the skillet.
Stir-fry until cabbage is tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce (or coconut aminos), a dash of apple cider vinegar, garlic powder, and red pepper flakes to taste.
Cook for another 1-2 minutes.
Serve hot.
recipes.notes: Recipe 95 - Spicy Sausage and Cabbage Stir-fry

recipes.name: Egg Roll in a Bowl
recipes.description: All the delicious flavors of an egg roll without the carb-heavy wrapper, served in a bowl.
instructions: Cook ground pork or beef (or chicken/turkey) in a large skillet until browned; drain excess fat.
Add minced garlic and ginger, cook until fragrant.
Stir in shredded coleslaw mix (or shredded cabbage and carrots - use carrots sparingly for keto).
Cook until cabbage is wilted and tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce (or coconut aminos), sesame oil, and a splash of rice vinegar (check for sugar, or use apple cider vinegar).
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with chopped green onions and sesame seeds.
A drizzle of sriracha (check for sugar) or keto-friendly chili garlic sauce can be added for spice.
ingredients: Ground pork or Beef (or other ground meat)
Optional: Rice vinegar (sugar-free) or Apple cider vinegar, Green onions, Sesame seeds, Sriracha or Chili garlic sauce
recipes.notes: Recipe 96 - Egg Roll in a Bowl

recipes.name: Garlic Herb Roasted Chicken and Veggies
recipes.description: A simple and flavorful one-pan meal with roasted chicken pieces and keto-friendly vegetables.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Cut bone-in, skin-on chicken pieces (thighs, drumsticks, or breast) and chop keto-friendly vegetables (e.g., broccoli, cauliflower, zucchini, bell peppers, asparagus) into bite-sized pieces.
Toss chicken and vegetables with olive oil, minced garlic, dried Italian herbs (or a mix of rosemary, thyme, oregano), salt, and pepper on a large baking sheet.
Ensure everything is well coated.
Arrange in a single layer.
Roast for 30-40 minutes (depending on chicken piece size), flipping vegetables halfway, until chicken is cooked through (internal temp 165°F) and vegetables are tender and lightly caramelized.
ingredients: Dried Italian herbs (or rosemary, thyme, oregano)
recipes.notes: Recipe 97 - Garlic Herb Roasted Chicken and Veggies

recipes.name: Chili (No Beans)
recipes.description: A hearty and flavorful beanless chili, perfect for a keto diet.
instructions: Brown ground beef (or a mix with ground sausage) in a large pot or Dutch oven with chopped onion (optional) and bell peppers (optional); drain excess fat.
Stir in minced garlic, chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add diced tomatoes (no sugar added, use sparingly), tomato paste (low sugar), and beef broth.
Bring to a simmer.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for at least 30 minutes (or longer for flavors to meld).
Adjust seasonings as needed.
Serve topped with shredded cheddar cheese, sour cream, and chopped green onions or avocado.
ingredients: Optional: Onion, Bell peppers, Cheddar cheese, Sour cream, Green onions, Avocado

recipes.name: Lemon Dill Tilapia with Roasted Asparagus
recipes.description: A light and quick fish dinner featuring tilapia seasoned with lemon and dill, served with roasted asparagus.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Toss asparagus spears with olive oil, salt, and pepper on one side of a baking sheet.
Place tilapia fillets on the other side of the baking sheet.
Drizzle tilapia with melted butter or olive oil.
Season with salt, pepper, dried dill, and garlic powder.
Top with thin lemon slices.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until tilapia is cooked through and flakes easily, and asparagus is tender-crisp.
ingredients: Tilapia fillets (or other mild white fish)
recipes.notes: Recipe 99 - Lemon Dill Tilapia with Roasted Asparagus

recipes.name: Swedish Meatballs with Cauliflower Rice
recipes.description: Flavorful keto meatballs in a creamy gravy, served over cauliflower rice instead of traditional noodles.
instructions: Prepare meatballs: Combine ground beef (or beef/pork mix), almond flour or crushed pork rinds, a beaten egg, finely chopped onion (optional), allspice, nutmeg, salt, and pepper.
Form into small meatballs.
Brown meatballs in butter or oil in a skillet; set aside.
Make gravy: In the same skillet, melt more butter.
Whisk in a small amount of almond flour or xanthan gum (optional, for thickening).
Gradually whisk in beef broth and heavy cream.
Add a dash of soy sauce (or coconut aminos) and Dijon mustard.
Simmer until thickened.
Return meatballs to the gravy and simmer gently until heated through.
Serve over steamed cauliflower rice.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
ingredients: Almond flour or Crushed pork rinds
Optional: Onion (finely chopped), Xanthan gum, Fresh parsley
recipes.notes: Recipe 100 - Swedish Meatballs with Cauliflower Rice

recipes.name: Sausage and Spinach Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms
recipes.description: Large portobello mushrooms filled with a savory mixture of keto sausage, spinach, and cheese.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Clean large portobello mushroom caps; gently remove stems and chop them.
Brush caps lightly with olive oil.
Cook keto sausage (crumbled) in a skillet until browned.
Add chopped mushroom stems, minced garlic, and fresh spinach; cook until spinach wilts.
Drain any excess fat.
Stir in cream cheese, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper until combined.
Fill portobello caps generously with the sausage mixture.
Top with shredded mozzarella or provolone cheese.
Place stuffed mushrooms on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until mushrooms are tender and cheese is melted and bubbly.
recipes.notes: Recipe 101 - Sausage and Spinach Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms

recipes.name: Chicken Cordon Bleu Casserole
recipes.description: All the flavors of chicken cordon bleu in an easy-to-make keto casserole.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Grease a baking dish.
Layer diced cooked chicken in the bottom of the dish.
Top with diced ham (check for low sugar).
Prepare sauce: In a saucepan, melt butter.
Whisk in a small amount of almond flour or xanthan gum (optional).
Gradually whisk in heavy cream and chicken broth.
Stir in Dijon mustard and grated Swiss cheese (or Gruyere) until melted and smooth.
Season with salt and pepper.
Pour cheese sauce evenly over the chicken and ham.
Sprinkle with more Swiss cheese and crushed pork rinds (for a crispy topping).
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until bubbly and heated through.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
ingredients: Optional: Almond flour or Xanthan gum, Crushed pork rinds, Fresh parsley

recipes.name: Tuscan Salmon with Spinach and Sun-Dried Tomatoes
recipes.description: Creamy and flavorful salmon dish with Tuscan-inspired ingredients like spinach and sun-dried tomatoes.
instructions: Pan-sear salmon fillets until cooked through; set aside.
In the same skillet, sauté minced garlic.
Add sun-dried tomatoes (oil-packed, drained) and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and chicken broth.
Bring to a simmer.
Add fresh spinach and cook until wilted.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese.
Season sauce with salt, pepper, and Italian herbs.
Return salmon to the skillet, spoon sauce over.
Serve immediately, perhaps with zucchini noodles or cauliflower rice.
recipes.notes: Recipe 103 - Tuscan Salmon with Spinach and Sun-Dried Tomatoes

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff with Cauliflower Mash
recipes.description: A rich and creamy beef stroganoff made keto-friendly, served over cauliflower mash or keto noodles.
instructions: Thinly slice beef (sirloin or tenderloin) or use ground beef.
Season with salt and pepper.
Brown beef in butter or olive oil in a skillet; set aside.
In the same skillet, sauté sliced mushrooms and chopped onion (optional) until softened.
Add minced garlic.
Stir in beef broth and a touch of Dijon mustard.
Bring to a simmer.
Reduce heat and stir in sour cream (full-fat) and a splash of heavy cream until smooth and creamy.
Do not boil.
Return beef to the skillet.
Heat through.
Garnish with fresh parsley or dill.
Serve over cauliflower mash or shirataki/zucchini noodles.
ingredients: Optional: Onion (chopped), Fresh parsley or Dill
recipes.notes: Recipe 104 - Beef Stroganoff with Cauliflower Mash

recipes.name: Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Brussels Sprouts ()
recipes.description: Juicy roasted pork tenderloin served alongside crispy roasted Brussels sprouts.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Season pork tenderloin with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and dried rosemary or thyme.
Toss trimmed Brussels sprouts (halved or quartered) with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear pork tenderloin on all sides until browned.
Scatter Brussels sprouts around the pork tenderloin in the skillet (or transfer all to a baking sheet).
Roast in the oven for 15-20 minutes, or until pork reaches an internal temperature of 145°F and Brussels sprouts are tender and slightly charred.
Let pork rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing.
recipes.notes: Recipe 105 - Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Brussels Sprouts ()

recipes.name: Chicken Shawarma Plate
recipes.description: Flavorful Middle Eastern spiced chicken served as a plate with keto-friendly sides.
instructions: Marinate chicken thighs or breast (thinly sliced) in olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, cumin, coriander, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper for at least 30 minutes.
Cook chicken in a hot skillet or grill until cooked through and slightly charred.

Serve chicken with a side of keto tzatziki sauce (Greek yogurt or sour cream based, cucumber, garlic, dill), a simple salad of chopped cucumber and tomatoes (use tomatoes sparingly), and perhaps some cauliflower rice or keto flatbread.
ingredients: For serving: Keto tzatziki, Cucumber, Tomatoes

recipes.name: Baked Chicken Thighs with Creamy Spinach
recipes.description: Crispy baked chicken thighs served with a side of rich and creamy spinach.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Season bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs with salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder.
Bake on a baking sheet for 35-45 minutes, or until skin is crispy and chicken is cooked through (165°F).
While chicken bakes, prepare creamy spinach: Sauté minced garlic in butter.
Add fresh spinach and cook until wilted.
Stir in cream cheese (full-fat) and a splash of heavy cream until smooth and creamy.
Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of nutmeg.
Serve baked chicken thighs with the creamy spinach.
recipes.notes: Recipe 107 - Baked Chicken Thighs with Creamy Spinach

recipes.name: Cheeseburger Casserole
recipes.description: All the flavors of a cheeseburger in a comforting and easy keto casserole.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Brown ground beef with chopped onion (optional) in a skillet; drain fat.
Stir in salt, pepper, garlic powder, and a bit of Worcestershire sauce (keto-friendly).
Spread meat mixture in a baking dish.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, heavy cream (or unsweetened almond milk), and a little Dijon mustard.
Pour over the meat.
Top generously with shredded cheddar cheese and crumbled cooked bacon (optional).
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until set and cheese is bubbly and golden.
Serve with shredded lettuce, chopped pickles, and sugar-free ketchup/mustard if desired.
ingredients: Heavy cream or Unsweetened almond milk
Optional: Onion, Cooked bacon, Lettuce, Pickles

recipes.name: Blackened Tilapia with Avocado Salsa
recipes.description: Spicy blackened tilapia fillets topped with a refreshing avocado salsa.
instructions: Prepare avocado salsa: Dice avocado, red onion, cilantro, and a small jalapeño (optional).
Toss gently with lime juice and salt.
Set aside.
Pat tilapia fillets dry.
Coat generously with blackened seasoning (ensure it's sugar-free, or make your own with paprika, cayenne, garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, oregano, salt, pepper).
Heat olive oil or avocado oil in a skillet (preferably cast iron) over medium-high heat.
Cook tilapia for 3-4 minutes per side, until blackened and cooked through.
Serve blackened tilapia topped with the avocado salsa.
recipes.notes: Recipe 109 - Blackened Tilapia with Avocado Salsa

recipes.name: Pulled Pork (Slow Cooker or Instant Pot)
recipes.description: Tender and flavorful pulled pork made easily in a slow cooker or Instant Pot, served with keto BBQ sauce.
instructions: Rub a pork shoulder (butt) roast with a keto-friendly dry rub (e.g., paprika, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, pepper, keto sweetener).
Slow Cooker: Place roast in slow cooker.
Add a little apple cider vinegar and beef broth.
Cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 3-4 hours, until fork-tender.
Instant Pot: Sear roast on all sides using sauté function.
Add vinegar and broth.
Cook on high pressure for 60-90 minutes (depending on size), then natural release.
Remove pork, shred with two forks.
Discard excess fat/liquid or reduce liquid to make a sauce.
Toss shredded pork with sugar-free BBQ sauce.
Serve on keto buns, in lettuce wraps, or as part of a plate.
recipes.notes: Recipe 110 - Pulled Pork (Slow Cooker or Instant Pot)

recipes.name: Creamy Pesto Chicken with Zucchini Noodles
recipes.description: Tender chicken in a creamy pesto sauce served over low-carb zucchini noodles.
instructions: Cook diced or sliced chicken breast in olive oil or butter until browned and cooked through.
Stir in prepared keto-friendly pesto (check for low sugar/carbs) and heavy cream.
Simmer for a few minutes until sauce thickens slightly.
Add halved cherry tomatoes (optional, use sparingly) and cook until just softened.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve creamy pesto chicken over lightly sautéed or raw zucchini noodles.
Garnish with Parmesan cheese.
recipes.notes: Recipe 111 - Creamy Pesto Chicken with Zucchini Noodles

recipes.name: Philly Cheesesteak Skillet
recipes.description: All the flavors of a Philly cheesesteak without the bun, made in one skillet.
instructions: Thinly slice beef steak (e.g., ribeye, sirloin).
Sliced onion and bell peppers (green or mixed colors).
Heat avocado oil or butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add sliced beef and cook until browned.
Remove beef and set aside.
Add onions and bell peppers to the skillet.
Sauté until softened and slightly caramelized (about 5-7 minutes).
Add minced garlic during the last minute.
Return beef to the skillet.
Season with salt, pepper, and Worcestershire sauce (keto-friendly).
Stir to combine.
Top with slices of provolone cheese (or Cheez Whiz if you can find a keto version/make one).
Cover skillet for a minute or two until cheese is melted.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Sausage and Cauliflower Rice Pilaf ()
recipes.description: A flavorful and satisfying one-pan meal using cauliflower rice and keto sausage.
instructions: Cook sliced keto-friendly sausage (e.g., chorizo, Italian, andouille) in a large skillet until browned.
Remove sausage and set aside, leaving some fat in the skillet.
Add chopped onion (optional) and diced bell peppers to the skillet; sauté until softened.
Add minced garlic.
Stir in riced cauliflower and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tender-crisp.
Stir in chicken broth, smoked paprika, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
Return cooked sausage to the skillet.
Cover and simmer for 5 minutes, or until liquid is mostly absorbed and flavors have melded.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
recipes.notes: Recipe 113 - Sausage and Cauliflower Rice Pilaf ()

recipes.name: Tuna Melts on Cloud Bread or Bread
recipes.description: Classic tuna melts made keto using cloud bread or your favorite keto bread.
instructions: Prepare keto tuna salad: Mix drained canned tuna with keto-friendly mayonnaise, chopped celery, salt, pepper, and a little Dijon mustard.
Make or use pre-made keto bread slices or cloud bread.
Top each slice of keto bread/cloud bread with a scoop of tuna salad.
Place a slice of cheddar or Swiss cheese on top.
Broil in the oven (or use a toaster oven) for 2-4 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Watch carefully to prevent burning.
Serve warm.
ingredients: Keto bread or Cloud bread slices
recipes.notes: Recipe 114 - Tuna Melts on Cloud Bread or Bread

recipes.name: Chicken Fajita Skillet ()
recipes.description: Sizzling chicken fajitas with peppers and onions, served without tortillas for a keto meal.
instructions: Slice chicken breast into strips.
Slice bell peppers (various colors) and onion into strips.
Toss chicken with lime juice, chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Heat avocado oil in a large skillet (preferably cast iron) over medium-high heat.
Add chicken strips and cook until browned and cooked through.
Remove chicken.
Add bell peppers and onions to the skillet.
Sauté until tender-crisp and slightly charred.
Return chicken to the skillet.
Toss to combine.
Serve hot with keto-friendly toppings like sour cream, guacamole, shredded cheese, and lettuce wraps.
ingredients: Optional toppings: Sour cream, Guacamole, Cheese, Lettuce wraps

recipes.name: Ground Beef and Cabbage Casserole
recipes.description: A simple, budget-friendly, and comforting casserole with ground beef and tender cabbage.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Brown ground beef with chopped onion (optional) in a skillet; drain fat.
Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and dried thyme or savory.
Shred or roughly chop cabbage.
In a greased baking dish, layer half the cabbage, then the ground beef mixture, then remaining cabbage.
In a bowl, whisk together heavy cream (or beef broth for a lighter version), a beaten egg (optional, for binding), and a touch of Dijon mustard.
Pour evenly over the cabbage and beef.
Top with shredded cheddar or mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until cabbage is tender and topping is bubbly and golden.
Let rest before serving.
recipes.notes: Recipe 116 - Ground Beef and Cabbage Casserole

recipes.name: Coconut Curry Shrimp with Cauliflower Rice ()
recipes.description: Flavorful shrimp in a creamy coconut curry sauce, served over cauliflower rice.
instructions: Sauté chopped onion (optional) and minced garlic and ginger in coconut oil in a skillet until fragrant.
Stir in red curry paste (check for sugar) and cook for 1 minute.
Add full-fat coconut milk and a splash of fish sauce (optional).
Bring to a simmer.
Add shrimp (peeled and deveined) and sliced bell peppers or other keto veggies (e.g., green beans, spinach).
Cook until shrimp are pink and opaque and vegetables are tender-crisp (about 3-5 minutes).
Stir in lime juice and fresh chopped cilantro.
Season with salt if needed.
