Serve hot over steamed cauliflower rice.
ingredients: Optional: Onion (chopped), Bell peppers, Fish sauce, Salt
recipes.notes: Recipe 117 - Coconut Curry Shrimp with Cauliflower Rice ()

recipes.name: Chicken Piccata
recipes.description: Tender chicken cutlets in a tangy lemon-butter and caper sauce, made keto-friendly.
instructions: Pound thin chicken cutlets (or slice breasts thinly).
Season with salt and pepper.
Lightly dredge in almond flour (optional).
Heat butter and olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook chicken cutlets for 2-3 minutes per side, until golden and cooked through.
Remove chicken and set aside.
To the same skillet, add more butter if needed.
Add minced garlic and cook for 30 seconds.
Deglaze with chicken broth and fresh lemon juice.
Bring to a simmer, scraping up any browned bits.
Stir in capers (drained).
Simmer for a minute or two until sauce slightly reduces.
Return chicken to the skillet, spoon sauce over.
Garnish with fresh parsley.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls ()
recipes.description: Cabbage leaves stuffed with a savory meat and cauliflower rice mixture, baked in tomato sauce.
instructions: Steam or boil whole cabbage leaves until pliable; carefully separate.
Prepare filling: Combine ground beef (or beef/pork mix), riced cauliflower, a beaten egg, finely chopped onion (optional), garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Place a portion of the meat mixture onto each cabbage leaf.
Roll up, tucking in the sides.
Spread a thin layer of sugar-free tomato sauce (or crushed tomatoes) in the bottom of a baking dish.
Arrange cabbage rolls seam-down in the dish.
Pour more tomato sauce over the rolls.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 375°F for 45-60 minutes, or until meat is cooked through and cabbage is tender.
Uncover for the last 10-15 minutes.
Serve with a dollop of sour cream if desired.

recipes.name: Salmon Patties with Dill Sauce
recipes.description: Simple and flavorful salmon patties served with a creamy dill sauce.
instructions: Make salmon patties: Combine drained canned salmon (or cooked fresh salmon, flaked) with a beaten egg, almond flour or crushed pork rinds, finely chopped green onion or chives, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper.
Form into patties.
Heat olive oil or butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Cook salmon patties for 3-4 minutes per side, until golden brown and heated through.
Prepare dill sauce: Mix keto-friendly mayonnaise or sour cream with chopped fresh dill, lemon juice, and a pinch of salt.
Serve salmon patties with the dill sauce and a side of keto vegetables.
ingredients: Canned salmon (drained, or cooked fresh salmon)
Almond flour or Crushed pork rinds
Keto-friendly mayonnaise or Sour cream (for sauce)
recipes.notes: Recipe 120 - Salmon Patties with Dill Sauce

recipes.name: Instant Pot Pot Roast with Radishes
recipes.description: Tender pot roast cooked in an Instant Pot with low-carb radishes as a potato substitute.
instructions: Season a beef chuck roast with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder.
Sear on all sides using the Instant Pot's sauté function with olive oil or avocado oil.
Remove roast.
Add chopped onion (optional), celery, and garlic to the pot; sauté until softened.
Deglaze with beef broth, scraping up browned bits.
Return roast to the pot.
Add more beef broth, Worcestershire sauce (keto-friendly), bay leaf, and dried thyme.
Add trimmed radishes (whole or halved) around the roast.
Secure lid, set to high pressure, and cook for 60-90 minutes (depending on roast size).
Allow natural pressure release for 10-15 minutes, then quick release any remaining pressure.
Remove roast and radishes.
If desired, thicken a portion of the cooking liquid with xanthan gum slurry to make gravy.
recipes.notes: Recipe 121 - Instant Pot Pot Roast with Radishes

recipes.name: Moussaka (Eggplant Casserole)
recipes.description: A layered Greek casserole with eggplant, spiced meat sauce, and a creamy keto béchamel-style topping.
instructions: Slice eggplant, salt generously, and let sit for 30 minutes to draw out moisture.
Pat dry and roast or pan-fry slices until tender and lightly browned.
Prepare meat sauce: Brown ground lamb or beef with chopped onion (optional) and garlic.
Drain fat.
Stir in tomato paste (low sugar), diced tomatoes (sparingly), cinnamon, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Simmer until thickened.
Prepare keto béchamel: Melt butter, whisk in almond flour (small amount).
Gradually whisk in warm heavy cream or unsweetened almond milk.
Cook until thickened.
Stir in beaten egg yolks (tempered), grated Parmesan or Gruyere cheese, and a pinch of nutmeg.
Layer in a baking dish: eggplant slices, meat sauce, then another layer of eggplant.
Top with the keto béchamel.
Bake at 375°F for 30-40 minutes, or until bubbly and topping is golden.
Let rest before serving.
ingredients: Heavy cream or Unsweetened almond milk (for béchamel)

recipes.name: Crack Chicken (Slow Cooker/Instant Pot)
recipes.description: Addictively delicious shredded chicken with cream cheese, bacon, and ranch seasoning.
instructions: Place chicken breasts or thighs in a slow cooker or Instant Pot.
Top with cream cheese (cubed) and a packet of keto-friendly dry ranch seasoning mix (check for sugar/maltodextrin).
Sprinkle with cooked, crumbled bacon.
Slow Cooker: Cook on low for 4-6 hours or high for 2-3 hours.
Instant Pot: Cook on high pressure for 15-20 minutes, then quick release.
Shred chicken with two forks, stirring to combine with the creamy sauce and bacon.
Serve in lettuce wraps, on keto buns, with celery sticks, or as a topping for cauliflower rice.
Can stir in more shredded cheddar if desired.

recipes.name: Sheet Pan Lemon Herb Chicken and Green Beans
recipes.description: A simple one-pan meal with tender chicken and green beans, flavored with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Toss bone-in, skin-on chicken pieces (or boneless, skinless cut into chunks) with olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried oregano, dried thyme, salt, and pepper.
Toss fresh green beans (trimmed) with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Arrange chicken and green beans in a single layer on a large baking sheet.
Place lemon slices over the chicken if desired.
Roast for 25-35 minutes (depending on chicken thickness), or until chicken is cooked through (165°F) and green beans are tender-crisp.
Broil for the last 2-3 minutes for crispier chicken skin.
recipes.notes: Recipe 124 - Sheet Pan Lemon Herb Chicken and Green Beans

recipes.name: Beef Kebab Skewers with Bell Peppers and Onion
recipes.description: Grilled or baked beef kebabs with colorful vegetables, marinated for extra flavor.
instructions: Cube beef sirloin or chuck steak.
Marinate for at least 30 minutes in olive oil, soy sauce (or coconut aminos), Worcestershire sauce (keto-friendly), minced garlic, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
Chop bell peppers (various colors) and red onion into 1-inch pieces.
Thread marinated beef cubes and vegetable pieces alternately onto skewers (if using wooden skewers, soak them in water first).
Grill over medium-high heat for 8-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until beef is cooked to desired doneness and vegetables are tender-charred.
Alternatively, bake at 400°F on a baking sheet for 15-20 minutes, turning halfway.
recipes.notes: Recipe 125 - Beef Kebab Skewers with Bell Peppers and Onion

recipes.name: Creamy Garlic Parmesan Chicken Wings (Baked)
recipes.description: Crispy baked chicken wings tossed in a rich and savory garlic Parmesan sauce.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Pat chicken wings very dry with paper towels.
Toss with baking powder (for crispiness, optional), salt, and pepper.
Arrange wings in a single layer on a wire rack set over a baking sheet.
Bake for 40-50 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden brown and crispy.
While wings bake, prepare sauce: Melt butter in a saucepan.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Remove from heat and stir in grated Parmesan cheese, heavy cream (optional, for extra creaminess), fresh parsley, salt, and pepper.
Toss crispy baked wings in the garlic Parmesan sauce until evenly coated.
Serve immediately.
recipes.notes: Recipe 126 - Creamy Garlic Parmesan Chicken Wings (Baked)

recipes.name: Coq au Vin (Chicken in Red Wine)
recipes.description: A simplified keto version of the classic French dish with chicken, mushrooms, and bacon in a rich red wine sauce.
instructions: Cook chopped bacon in a Dutch oven or large pot until crispy.
Remove bacon, reserve fat.
Season chicken pieces (thighs or legs) with salt and pepper.
Brown chicken in bacon fat; set aside.
Sauté chopped onion (optional), carrots (sparingly), and mushrooms in the same pot until softened.
Add minced garlic.
Return chicken and bacon to the pot.
Add dry red wine (e.g., Burgundy, Pinot Noir) and chicken broth to mostly cover.
Add a bay leaf and fresh thyme sprigs.
Bring to a simmer, then cover and cook on low heat for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is very tender.
If desired, thicken sauce slightly with a small xanthan gum slurry or by simmering uncovered for a few minutes.
Remove bay leaf and thyme sprigs before serving.
ingredients: Chicken pieces (bone-in, skin-on, e.g., thighs, legs)
recipes.notes: Recipe 127 - Coq au Vin (Chicken in Red Wine)

recipes.name: Arrabbiata Sauce with Shirataki Noodles
recipes.description: A spicy Italian tomato sauce served over zero-carb shirataki noodles.
instructions: Prepare shirataki noodles according to package directions (usually involves rinsing and pan-frying to remove excess water).
Make Arrabbiata sauce: Sauté minced garlic and red pepper flakes (to taste) in olive oil in a saucepan.
Add canned crushed tomatoes (no sugar added) and a pinch of dried oregano.
Simmer sauce for 10-15 minutes, or until slightly thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.
Stir in fresh chopped parsley or basil.
Toss prepared shirataki noodles with the Arrabbiata sauce.
Serve hot, topped with grated Parmesan cheese if desired.
recipes.notes: Recipe 128 - Arrabbiata Sauce with Shirataki Noodles

recipes.name: Pork Steaks with Sautéed Spinach and Garlic
recipes.description: Quickly pan-fried pork steaks served with flavorful garlic sautéed spinach.
instructions: Season thin-cut pork steaks (e.g., shoulder steaks) with salt, pepper, and paprika.
Heat olive oil or avocado oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook pork steaks for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through and nicely browned.
Set aside and keep warm.
In the same skillet, add a little more oil if needed.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant (about 30 seconds).
Add fresh spinach in batches, tossing until it wilts down.
Season spinach with salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lemon juice (optional).
Serve pork steaks alongside the sautéed spinach.
recipes.notes: Recipe 129 - Pork Steaks with Sautéed Spinach and Garlic

recipes.name: Kung Pao Chicken with Cauliflower Rice
recipes.description: A spicy and savory keto version of Kung Pao chicken, served with cauliflower rice.
instructions: Dice chicken breast or thighs.
Marinate briefly in soy sauce (or coconut aminos) and a pinch of xanthan gum (optional, for texture).
Prepare sauce: Whisk soy sauce/coconut aminos, rice vinegar (check for sugar) or apple cider vinegar, keto-friendly sweetener, sesame oil, and a little chili garlic sauce or red pepper flakes.
Heat avocado oil in a wok or large skillet.
Stir-fry chicken until cooked through.
Add chopped bell peppers, celery (optional), and dried red chilies (optional, for heat).
Stir-fry for a few minutes.
Add minced garlic and ginger; stir-fry until fragrant.
Pour sauce over chicken and vegetables.
Stir-fry until sauce thickens slightly.
Stir in roasted peanuts (or cashews - use sparingly for keto).
Serve hot over cauliflower rice.
Garnish with chopped green onions.
ingredients: Rice vinegar (sugar-free) or Apple cider vinegar
Optional: Xanthan gum, Celery, Dried red chilies, Chili garlic sauce, Green onions, Cauliflower rice
recipes.notes: Recipe 130 - Kung Pao Chicken with Cauliflower Rice

recipes.name: Broiled Lobster Tails with Garlic Herb Butter
recipes.description: Elegant and delicious broiled lobster tails basted with a savory garlic herb butter.
instructions: Preheat broiler.
Prepare lobster tails: Using kitchen shears, cut lengthwise through the top of the lobster shell, stopping at the tail fan.
Gently separate the meat from the shell, lifting it up to rest on top of the shell (butterfly style).
Prepare garlic herb butter: Melt butter and stir in minced garlic, chopped fresh parsley, a squeeze of lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
A pinch of paprika is optional.
Place lobster tails on a baking sheet.
Brush generously with the garlic herb butter.
Broil 4-6 inches from the heat for 5-8 minutes (depending on size), or until lobster meat is opaque and cooked through.
Baste with more butter during broiling if desired.
Be careful not to overcook.
Serve immediately with lemon wedges.
recipes.notes: Recipe 131 - Broiled Lobster Tails with Garlic Herb Butter

recipes.name: Cabbage Rolls (Unstuffed/Deconstructed)
recipes.description: All the flavors of cabbage rolls in an easy, deconstructed skillet meal.
instructions: Brown ground beef (or beef/pork mix) with chopped onion (optional) in a large skillet; drain fat.
Add shredded or chopped cabbage and minced garlic to the skillet.
Cook, stirring, until cabbage is tender-crisp.
Stir in sugar-free tomato sauce (or diced tomatoes - check carbs), beef broth, paprika, dried dill or caraway seeds (for traditional flavor), salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until flavors meld and sauce has slightly thickened.
Serve hot, optionally topped with a dollop of sour cream.

recipes.name: Mediterranean Chicken Skillet with Olives and Feta
recipes.description: A quick one-skillet chicken dish with Mediterranean flavors like olives, feta, and oregano.
instructions: Cut chicken breast or thighs into bite-sized pieces.
Season with salt, pepper, and dried oregano.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
Add halved cherry tomatoes (use sparingly) or sun-dried tomatoes (oil-packed, drained), Kalamata olives (halved or whole), and minced garlic to the skillet.
Cook for 2-3 minutes until tomatoes soften slightly and garlic is fragrant.
Stir in a splash of chicken broth or lemon juice.
Crumble feta cheese over the top.
Garnish with fresh parsley or dill.
Serve hot.
ingredients: Optional: Cherry tomatoes or Sun-dried tomatoes, Chicken broth or Lemon juice, Fresh parsley or Dill
recipes.notes: Recipe 133 - Mediterranean Chicken Skillet with Olives and Feta

recipes.name: Jambalaya with Sausage and Shrimp (Cauliflower Rice)
recipes.description: A spicy and flavorful keto version of jambalaya using cauliflower rice, sausage, and shrimp.
instructions: Cook sliced andouille sausage (keto-friendly) in a large pot or Dutch oven until browned.
Remove sausage and set aside.
In the same pot, sauté chopped onion (optional), bell peppers (green and other colors), and celery until softened.
Add minced garlic.
Stir in riced cauliflower, diced tomatoes (no sugar added, sparingly), chicken broth, Cajun or Creole seasoning (ensure sugar-free), smoked paprika, and a bay leaf.
Bring to a simmer.
Return cooked sausage to the pot.
Add raw shrimp (peeled and deveined).
Cover and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until cauliflower rice is tender and shrimp are pink and cooked through.
Remove bay leaf.
Stir in chopped green onions and fresh parsley.
Season with salt and hot sauce to taste.
ingredients: Optional: Onion (chopped), Green onions, Fresh parsley, Hot sauce
recipes.notes: Recipe 134 - Jambalaya with Sausage and Shrimp (Cauliflower Rice)

recipes.name: Baked Pork Tenderloin with Dijon Herb Crust
recipes.description: A flavorful and tender pork tenderloin coated in a Dijon mustard and herb mixture.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Pat pork tenderloin dry.
In a small bowl, mix Dijon mustard (sugar-free), olive oil, minced garlic, dried rosemary, dried thyme, salt, and pepper.
Spread the Dijon-herb mixture evenly over all sides of the pork tenderloin.
Place the tenderloin on a baking rack set over a baking sheet (or directly on a lightly oiled baking sheet).
Roast for 20-25 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F.
Let the pork rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing and serving.
Serve with a side of keto vegetables.
recipes.notes: Recipe 135 - Baked Pork Tenderloin with Dijon Herb Crust

recipes.name: Salisbury Steak with Mushroom Gravy
recipes.description: Comforting Salisbury steak patties smothered in a rich keto mushroom gravy.
instructions: Prepare patties: Combine ground beef, almond flour or crushed pork rinds, a beaten egg, finely chopped onion (optional), Worcestershire sauce (keto-friendly), salt, and pepper.
Form into oval patties.
Brown patties in butter or oil in a large skillet on both sides; remove and set aside.
Make gravy: In the same skillet, add more butter if needed.
Sauté sliced mushrooms until browned.
Add minced garlic.
Sprinkle with a tiny amount of xanthan gum or almond flour (optional, for thickening).
Gradually whisk in beef broth.
Add a dash of Dijon mustard and Worcestershire sauce.
Simmer until gravy thickens slightly.
Return patties to the skillet with the gravy.
Cover and simmer gently for 10-15 minutes, or until patties are cooked through.
Serve with cauliflower mash.
ingredients: Almond flour or Crushed pork rinds (for patties)
Optional: Onion (finely chopped, for patties), Xanthan gum or Almond flour (for gravy)
recipes.notes: Recipe 136 - Salisbury Steak with Mushroom Gravy

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Butter Shrimp and Asparagus Skillet
recipes.description: A quick and vibrant one-skillet meal with shrimp and asparagus in a lemon garlic butter sauce.
instructions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes (optional); cook until fragrant (about 1 minute).
Add asparagus spears (trimmed and cut into 1-2 inch pieces).
Cook for 3-5 minutes, until tender-crisp.
Add shrimp (peeled and deveined) to the skillet.
Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until pink and opaque.
Stir in fresh lemon juice and chopped fresh parsley.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Toss to combine.
Serve immediately.
recipes.notes: Recipe 137 - Lemon Garlic Butter Shrimp and Asparagus Skillet

recipes.name: Chicken and Broccoli Casserole
recipes.description: A creamy and cheesy casserole with chicken and broccoli, a keto comfort food classic.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Grease a baking dish.
Combine cooked, diced or shredded chicken and steamed or blanched broccoli florets in the baking dish.
Prepare sauce: In a saucepan, melt butter.
Stir in cream cheese until smooth.
Gradually whisk in heavy cream or unsweetened almond milk.
Add garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
Stir in shredded cheddar cheese (or a mix of cheeses) until melted and sauce is smooth.
Pour cheese sauce over the chicken and broccoli, ensuring everything is coated.
Top with more shredded cheese and optionally some crushed pork rinds for crunch.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until bubbly and heated through and topping is golden.
ingredients: Heavy cream or Unsweetened almond milk

recipes.name: One-Pan Roasted Sausage, Peppers, and Onions
recipes.description: A simple and flavorful sheet pan meal with minimal cleanup.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Slice keto-friendly sausages (e.g., Italian, bratwurst - check for low sugar) into 1-inch pieces.
Slice bell peppers (various colors) and an onion into strips.
Mince garlic.
On a large baking sheet, toss sausage, peppers, onion, and garlic with olive oil, Italian seasoning (or oregano and basil), salt, and pepper.
Ensure everything is in a single layer.
Roast for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway, until sausages are browned and cooked through, and vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.
Serve as is or with cauliflower rice.
recipes.notes: Recipe 139 - One-Pan Roasted Sausage, Peppers, and Onions

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
recipes.description: Tangy and sweet keto lemon bars with a buttery almond flour crust.
instructions: Crust: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Combine almond flour, melted butter, and keto-friendly powdered sweetener.
Press into the bottom of a greased 8x8 inch baking pan.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until lightly golden.
Filling: Whisk together eggs, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, and keto-friendly powdered sweetener until smooth.
Pour over the baked crust.
Bake for another 15-20 minutes, or until the lemon filling is just set.
Let cool completely at room temperature, then refrigerate for at least 1-2 hours to firm up before cutting into squares.
Dust with powdered sweetener if desired.
ingredients: Butter (melted for crust, softened for filling if needed by specific recipe)

recipes.name: Cheesecake Fluff
recipes.description: A light, airy, and no-bake keto cheesecake dessert that's quick to whip up.
instructions: In a mixing bowl, beat softened full-fat cream cheese with keto-friendly powdered sweetener and vanilla extract until smooth and fluffy.
In a separate bowl, whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Gently fold the whipped cream into the cream cheese mixture until well combined.
Serve immediately or chill for at least 30 minutes.
Can be topped with a few keto-friendly berries or sugar-free chocolate shavings.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic chocolate chip cookies made keto-friendly with almond flour and sugar-free chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a bowl, cream together softened butter, keto-friendly granular sweetener, and vanilla extract.
Beat in an egg.
In a separate bowl, whisk together almond flour, baking soda (or baking powder), and a pinch of salt.
Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
Fold in sugar-free chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto the prepared baking sheet.
Flatten slightly.
Bake for 10-14 minutes, or until edges are golden brown.
Let cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Mousse
recipes.description: A creamy and indulgent no-bake peanut butter mousse.
instructions: Beat softened full-fat cream cheese with unsweetened natural peanut butter (no sugar added), keto-friendly powdered sweetener, and vanilla extract until smooth.
In a separate bowl, whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Gently fold the whipped cream into the peanut butter mixture.
Spoon into serving dishes and chill for at least 30 minutes.
Garnish with sugar-free chocolate shavings or chopped peanuts if desired.
ingredients: Optional: Sugar-free chocolate shavings, Chopped peanuts

recipes.name: Strawberry Shortcake (Chaffle Base)
recipes.description: A keto take on strawberry shortcake using chaffles as the 'cake' base.
instructions: Prepare chaffles: Whisk 1 egg with 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella.
Add a touch of vanilla and keto sweetener if desired.
Cook in a mini waffle maker until golden.
Make 2 chaffles per serving.
Prepare whipped cream: Whip heavy cream with keto-friendly sweetener and vanilla extract until soft peaks form.
Slice fresh strawberries (use sparingly for keto).
Optionally, lightly sweeten them with keto sweetener.
Assemble: Place one chaffle on a plate, top with a layer of whipped cream and some sliced strawberries.
Place another chaffle on top, and finish with more whipped cream and strawberries.

recipes.name: Chocolate Bark with Nuts and Seeds
recipes.description: Simple and customizable keto chocolate bark loaded with nuts and seeds.
instructions: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

Melt sugar-free chocolate chips (e.g., Lily's) or unsweetened baking chocolate with a bit of coconut oil and keto-friendly sweetener (if using unsweetened chocolate) in a double boiler or microwave in short intervals, stirring until smooth.
Pour melted chocolate onto the prepared baking sheet and spread into a thin, even layer.
Sprinkle generously with chopped keto-friendly nuts (almonds, pecans, walnuts), seeds (pumpkin, sunflower, hemp), and unsweetened shredded coconut.
A pinch of sea salt is also nice.
Refrigerate for at least 30-60 minutes, or until firm.
Break into pieces.
Store in the refrigerator.
ingredients: Sugar-free chocolate chips or Unsweetened baking chocolate
Optional: Keto-friendly sweetener (if using unsweetened chocolate), Sea salt
recipes.notes: Recipe 145 - Chocolate Bark with Nuts and Seeds

recipes.name: Vanilla Bean Panna Cotta
recipes.description: An elegant and creamy Italian cooked cream dessert, made keto-friendly.
instructions: In a small bowl, sprinkle unflavored gelatin over a few tablespoons of cold water or unsweetened almond milk; let bloom for 5 minutes.
In a saucepan, combine heavy cream, keto-friendly sweetener, and the seeds from a vanilla bean (or vanilla extract).
Heat over medium heat, stirring, until sweetener is dissolved and mixture is warm (do not boil).
Remove from heat.
Whisk in the bloomed gelatin until completely dissolved.
Pour mixture into small ramekins or serving glasses.
Refrigerate for at least 3-4 hours, or until set.
Serve chilled, optionally with a few keto-friendly berries or a berry coulis (sugar-free).
ingredients: Water or Unsweetened almond milk (for blooming gelatin)

recipes.name: Coconut Macaroons
recipes.description: Chewy and sweet keto macaroons made with unsweetened coconut.
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a bowl, combine unsweetened shredded coconut, keto-friendly sweetener (powdered or granular), and egg whites (lightly beaten).
Add a splash of vanilla extract.
Mix well until combined.
Drop rounded tablespoons of the mixture onto the prepared baking sheet.
Shape into mounds.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until edges are golden brown and macaroons are set.
Let cool completely on the baking sheet before handling.
Optionally, drizzle with melted sugar-free chocolate.

recipes.name: Raspberry Mousse
recipes.description: A light and fruity mousse featuring fresh or frozen raspberries.
instructions: If using frozen raspberries, thaw them slightly.
Blend fresh or thawed raspberries until smooth, then strain through a fine-mesh sieve to remove seeds (optional, for smoother mousse).
In a mixing bowl, beat softened full-fat cream cheese with keto-friendly powdered sweetener and a splash of lemon juice or vanilla extract until smooth.
Gently fold in the raspberry puree.
In a separate bowl, whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Fold the whipped cream into the raspberry cream cheese mixture.
Spoon into serving glasses and chill for at least 1 hour.
Garnish with a few fresh raspberries.

recipes.name: Snickerdoodle Cookies
recipes.description: Soft and chewy keto snickerdoodles coated in cinnamon 'sugar'.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Dough: Cream together softened butter and keto-friendly granular sweetener.
Beat in an egg and vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, whisk almond flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, and a pinch of salt.
Gradually add dry to wet ingredients, mixing until combined.
Topping: In a small bowl, mix keto-friendly granular sweetener with ground cinnamon.
Roll dough into small balls.
Roll each ball in the cinnamon-sweetener mixture to coat.
Place balls on prepared baking sheet and flatten slightly.
Bake for 9-12 minutes, or until edges are set and lightly golden.
Let cool on baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack.

recipes.name: Chocolate Silk Pie (No-Bake)
recipes.description: A rich, decadent, and smooth no-bake keto chocolate pie with an almond flour crust.
instructions: Crust: Combine almond flour, melted butter, and a touch of keto sweetener.
Press into the bottom of a pie dish.
Chill while making filling.
Filling: Melt sugar-free chocolate chips (or unsweetened chocolate with added keto sweetener) with a little butter or coconut oil; let cool slightly.
Beat softened cream cheese with keto powdered sweetener and vanilla extract until fluffy.
Gradually beat in the cooled melted chocolate.
Fold in freshly whipped heavy cream (sweetened with keto sweetener if desired) until no streaks remain.
Pour filling into the chilled crust.
Refrigerate for at least 4-6 hours, or until firm.
Garnish with keto whipped cream and chocolate shavings before serving.
ingredients: Butter (melted for crust, softened for filling)
Sugar-free chocolate chips or Unsweetened chocolate
Heavy cream (for filling and optional topping)

recipes.name: Key Lime Pie Fat Bombs
recipes.description: Tangy and creamy fat bombs with the flavor of key lime pie.
instructions: Beat softened cream cheese with softened butter or coconut oil, keto-friendly powdered sweetener, fresh key lime juice (or regular lime juice), and lime zest until smooth and creamy.
Optionally, stir in a small amount of unsweetened shredded coconut for texture.
Spoon mixture into small silicone molds or roll into small balls and place on a parchment-lined plate.
Freeze for at least 30-60 minutes, or until firm.
Store in the freezer or refrigerator.
ingredients: Key lime juice (or regular lime juice)
recipes.notes: Recipe 151 - Key Lime Pie Fat Bombs

recipes.name: Mug Cake (Vanilla or Chocolate)
recipes.description: A quick single-serving keto cake made in a mug in the microwave.
instructions: In a microwave-safe mug, melt 1-2 tablespoons of butter.
Whisk in one egg.
Add almond flour (or coconut flour - adjust liquid), keto-friendly sweetener, baking powder, and vanilla extract.
For chocolate version, add 1-2 teaspoons unsweetened cocoa powder.
Mix well until smooth.
Microwave on high for 60-90 seconds, or until cake is puffed and cooked through (center should be just set).
Let cool for a minute.
Eat directly from mug or invert onto a plate.
Top with keto whipped cream or berries if desired.
ingredients: Optional for chocolate: Unsweetened cocoa powder

recipes.name: Brownies (Fudgy)
recipes.description: Rich and fudgy keto brownies made with almond flour and unsweetened chocolate.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Grease and line an 8x8 inch baking pan with parchment paper.
Melt unsweetened baking chocolate (or very dark sugar-free chocolate) with butter in a double boiler or microwave.
Let cool slightly.
In a bowl, beat eggs with keto-friendly granular sweetener and vanilla extract until pale and fluffy.
Gradually beat in the cooled melted chocolate mixture.
In a separate bowl, whisk together almond flour, a pinch of salt, and optionally a little unsweetened cocoa powder for extra richness.
Gently fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients until just combined.
Fold in sugar-free chocolate chips or chopped nuts if desired.
Spread batter evenly in prepared pan.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out with moist crumbs (do not overbake for fudgy texture).
Let cool completely before cutting.
ingredients: Unsweetened baking chocolate (or very dark sugar-free chocolate)
Optional: Unsweetened cocoa powder, Sugar-free chocolate chips, Chopped nuts

recipes.name: Berry Crumble
recipes.description: Warm mixed berries topped with a buttery, nutty keto crumble.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Filling: In a baking dish, toss mixed keto-friendly berries (e.g., raspberries, blueberries, blackberries, strawberries) with a little keto-friendly sweetener and a squeeze of lemon juice (optional).
Topping: In a bowl, combine almond flour, chopped pecans or walnuts, keto-friendly sweetener, cinnamon, and cold cubed butter.
Use your fingers or a pastry cutter to cut butter into the dry ingredients until a coarse crumble forms.
Sprinkle crumble topping evenly over the berries.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until berries are bubbly and topping is golden brown.
Let cool slightly.
Serve warm, perhaps with keto vanilla ice cream or whipped cream.

recipes.name: No-Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars
recipes.description: Layered no-bake bars with a peanut butter base and a chocolate topping.
instructions: Base: In a bowl, combine almond flour, unsweetened natural peanut butter, melted butter, keto-friendly powdered sweetener, and vanilla extract.
Mix well until a dough forms.
Press mixture evenly into the bottom of a parchment-lined square baking pan (e.g., 8x8 inch).
Topping: Melt sugar-free chocolate chips with a tablespoon of peanut butter or coconut oil until smooth.
Pour melted chocolate mixture over the peanut butter base, spreading evenly.
Refrigerate for at least 1-2 hours, or until firm and chocolate is set.
Cut into squares.
Store in the refrigerator.
recipes.notes: Recipe 155 - No-Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars

recipes.name: Tiramisu Cups (No-Bake)
recipes.description: Individual no-bake keto tiramisu desserts with coffee-soaked 'ladyfingers' and creamy mascarpone.
instructions: Keto 'Ladyfingers': Use slices of 90-second keto bread, or bake a thin sheet of almond flour sponge cake and cut into strips.
Briefly dip 'ladyfingers' in cooled strong brewed coffee (or espresso) mixed with a splash of rum extract (optional).
Mascarpone Cream: Beat egg yolks (pasteurized recommended) with keto-friendly powdered sweetener until pale.
Gently fold in mascarpone cheese and vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, whip heavy cream to stiff peaks and fold into the mascarpone mixture.
Assemble in individual cups or glasses: Layer coffee-dipped 'ladyfingers', then a layer of mascarpone cream.
Repeat layers.
Dust the top with unsweetened cocoa powder.
Chill for at least 2-4 hours (preferably overnight) to allow flavors to meld.
ingredients: Keto 'ladyfingers' (e.g., from 90-second bread or almond flour sponge)

recipes.name: Pumpkin Spice Fat Bombs
recipes.description: Creamy fat bombs with pumpkin puree and warm pumpkin spice flavors.
instructions: Beat softened cream cheese with softened butter or coconut oil, pumpkin puree (unsweetened), keto-friendly powdered sweetener, pumpkin pie spice, and vanilla extract until smooth and well combined.
Spoon mixture into small silicone molds or roll into small balls and place on a parchment-lined plate.
Freeze for at least 30-60 minutes, or until firm.
Store in the freezer or refrigerator.
Can be rolled in chopped pecans if desired.

recipes.name: Chocolate Covered Strawberries
recipes.description: Fresh strawberries dipped in melted sugar-free chocolate.
instructions: Wash and thoroughly dry fresh strawberries, leaving stems on if possible.
Melt sugar-free chocolate chips (e.g., Lily's) with a small amount of coconut oil in a double boiler or microwave in short intervals, stirring until smooth.
Dip each strawberry into the melted chocolate, allowing excess to drip off.
Place dipped strawberries on a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Refrigerate for 15-30 minutes, or until chocolate is set.
Serve chilled.
For fancy drizzle, melt a different color of sugar-free chocolate (e.g., white) and drizzle over.

recipes.name: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
recipes.description: Moist and tender keto muffins with bright lemon flavor and crunchy poppy seeds.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Line a muffin tin with paper liners or grease well.
In a bowl, whisk together almond flour, keto-friendly granular sweetener, baking powder, poppy seeds, and a pinch of salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together melted butter or coconut oil, eggs, unsweetened almond milk, fresh lemon juice, and lemon zest.
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Divide batter evenly among muffin cups.
Bake for 18-22 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Let cool in tin for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
Optional glaze: mix powdered sweetener with lemon juice.

recipes.name: 'Apple' Crisp (using Zucchini or Chayote)
recipes.description: A comforting fruit crisp illusion using zucchini or chayote squash as a low-carb apple substitute.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Peel, seed (if chayote), and dice zucchini or chayote squash into apple-sized pieces.
Filling: Toss diced zucchini/chayote with lemon juice, keto-friendly sweetener, cinnamon, nutmeg, and a pinch of xanthan gum (optional, to thicken).
Spread in a baking dish.
Topping: In a bowl, combine almond flour, chopped pecans or walnuts, keto-friendly sweetener, cinnamon, and cold cubed butter.
Cut butter into dry ingredients until a crumble forms.
Sprinkle topping over the zucchini/chayote mixture.
Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until filling is tender and bubbly, and topping is golden brown.
Let cool slightly.
Serve warm.

recipes.name: Chocolate Lava Cakes (Mug Cakes)
recipes.description: Individual molten chocolate lava cakes made quickly in mugs.
instructions: Grease two microwave-safe ramekins or mugs well with butter.
In a small bowl, melt sugar-free dark chocolate chips (or chopped unsweetened chocolate) with butter until smooth.
Stir in keto-friendly sweetener to taste if using unsweetened chocolate.
Whisk in an egg yolk and a splash of vanilla extract.
In a separate small bowl, beat an egg white until soft peaks form.
Gently fold the egg white into the chocolate mixture.
Divide batter between the prepared ramekins/mugs.
Place an extra square of sugar-free chocolate in the center of each if desired for extra molten center.
Microwave each mug separately on high for 45-75 seconds (time varies greatly by microwave), until edges are set but center is still gooey.
Do not overcook.
Let sit for a minute before serving carefully.
ingredients: Sugar-free dark chocolate chips (or unsweetened chocolate)
Optional: Extra chocolate square for center

recipes.name: Whipped Cream (Sugar-Free)
recipes.description: Simple homemade sugar-free whipped cream, perfect as a topping for many keto desserts.
instructions: Chill a mixing bowl and beaters (or whisk) in the freezer for 10-15 minutes.
Pour cold heavy whipping cream into the chilled bowl.
Beat on medium-high speed with an electric mixer (or vigorously with a whisk) until soft peaks begin to form.
Gradually add keto-friendly powdered sweetener (to taste) and a splash of vanilla extract.
Continue beating until stiff peaks form (be careful not to overbeat into butter).
Use immediately or store in the refrigerator for a few days.

recipes.name: 'Oreo' Chaffle Cookies
recipes.description: Dark chocolate chaffles sandwiched with a creamy keto filling, resembling Oreo cookies.
instructions: Chocolate Chaffles: Whisk 1 egg with 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella.
Add 1-2 tbsp unsweetened dark cocoa powder, keto sweetener to taste, and a splash of vanilla.
Cook in a preheated mini waffle maker until crisp.
Let cool completely.
Make several.
Cream Filling: Beat softened cream cheese with softened butter, keto-friendly powdered sweetener, and vanilla extract until smooth and fluffy.
Assemble: Spread a layer of the cream filling onto one cooled chocolate chaffle.
Top with another chocolate chaffle to create a sandwich cookie.
Repeat for remaining chaffles.
Chill to firm up the filling.
ingredients: Keto-friendly powdered sweetener (for chaffles and filling)

recipes.name: Almond Butter Cups
recipes.description: Homemade keto version of peanut butter cups, using almond butter.
instructions: Line a mini muffin tin with paper liners.
Melt sugar-free chocolate chips (e.g., Lily's) with a little coconut oil until smooth.
Spoon a small amount of melted chocolate into the bottom of each liner, just enough to cover.
Freeze for 10-15 minutes until set.
Filling: In a small bowl, mix unsweetened almond butter with a touch of keto-friendly powdered sweetener and a pinch of salt (if almond butter is unsalted).
Place a small dollop of the almond butter mixture on top of the set chocolate layer in each cup.
Top with remaining melted chocolate to cover the almond butter.
Refrigerate or freeze for at least 30 minutes, or until fully set.
Store in the refrigerator or freezer.
ingredients: Optional: Keto-friendly powdered sweetener (for filling), Salt (for filling)

recipes.name: Creme Brulee
recipes.description: Classic rich custard dessert with a 'brulee' (burnt) keto sweetener topping.
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F.
Have ramekins ready in a baking pan.
Scald heavy cream with vanilla bean seeds (or vanilla extract) in a saucepan (heat until just before boiling).
In a bowl, whisk egg yolks with keto-friendly granular sweetener until pale.
Slowly temper the egg yolks by gradually whisking in a small amount of the hot cream.
Then, pour the yolk mixture into the saucepan with the remaining cream, whisking constantly.
Strain custard mixture into the ramekins.
Place baking pan in oven and carefully pour hot water into the pan to come halfway up the sides of the ramekins (water bath).
Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until edges are set but center is still slightly jiggly.
Remove ramekins from water bath, let cool, then chill in refrigerator for at least 2-4 hours (or overnight).
Just before serving, sprinkle a thin, even layer of keto-friendly granular sweetener (e.g., erythritol that caramelizes well, or allulose) on top.
Use a kitchen torch to caramelize the sweetener until golden brown and crispy.
Alternatively, briefly broil (watch very carefully).
Let sit for a minute before serving.
ingredients: Keto-friendly granular sweetener (one that can caramelize for topping)

recipes.name: Chocolate Pots de Creme
recipes.description: Rich, decadent, and creamy baked chocolate custards.
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F.
Prepare ramekins.
In a saucepan, heat heavy cream with a pinch of salt until just simmering (do not boil).
Remove from heat.
Add chopped sugar-free dark chocolate (or unsweetened chocolate plus keto sweetener) and let sit for 5 minutes to melt, then whisk until smooth.
In a separate bowl, lightly whisk egg yolks with keto-friendly sweetener (if needed, depending on chocolate) and vanilla extract.
Slowly pour a small amount of the warm chocolate cream into the egg yolks, whisking constantly to temper.
Then, pour the egg yolk mixture back into the saucepan with the remaining chocolate cream, whisking.
Strain mixture into ramekins.
Place in a baking pan and create a water bath by pouring hot water into the pan to come halfway up the sides.
Bake for 25-35 minutes, or until edges are set but centers are still slightly soft (they will firm up as they cool).
Let cool, then chill in refrigerator for at least 2-3 hours.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Cinnamon Donut Holes (Baked)
recipes.description: Baked keto donut holes coated in cinnamon 'sugar'.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Grease a mini muffin tin or donut hole pan.
Batter: Whisk together almond flour, keto-friendly granular sweetener, baking powder, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk melted butter, an egg, and unsweetened almond milk or heavy cream, and vanilla extract.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Fill mini muffin cups about 2/3 full.
Bake for 10-14 minutes, or until golden and a toothpick comes out clean.
Topping: While warm, brush donut holes lightly with melted butter.
In a separate small bowl, mix keto-friendly granular sweetener with more cinnamon.
Roll the buttered donut holes in the cinnamon-sweetener mixture.
Let cool.
ingredients: Unsweetened almond milk or Heavy cream

recipes.name: Hot Chocolate
recipes.description: A rich and creamy sugar-free hot chocolate perfect for a cozy evening.
instructions: In a small saucepan, gently heat unsweetened almond milk (or coconut milk) with unsweetened cocoa powder, keto-friendly sweetener to taste, and a splash of vanilla extract.
Whisk continuously until well combined, heated through, and slightly frothy.
Do not boil.
For extra richness, stir in a tablespoon of heavy cream or a small pat of butter at the end.
Pour into a mug and optionally top with keto whipped cream and a sprinkle of cocoa powder.
ingredients: Unsweetened almond milk or Coconut milk
Optional: Heavy cream, Butter, Keto whipped cream

recipes.name: Matcha Latte
recipes.description: A creamy and energizing keto latte made with matcha green tea.
instructions: Sift matcha green tea powder into a mug or bowl to prevent clumps.
Add a few tablespoons of hot water (not boiling) and whisk vigorously (traditionally with a bamboo whisk, or a small regular whisk/milk frother) until frothy and smooth.
Heat unsweetened almond milk or coconut milk until warm.
Froth if desired.
Pour warmed/frothed milk into the matcha.
Stir in keto-friendly sweetener to taste.
A teaspoon of MCT oil or coconut oil can be added for extra fats.
ingredients: Matcha green tea powder (unsweetened, ceremonial or culinary grade)
Unsweetened almond milk or Coconut milk
Optional: MCT oil or Coconut oil

recipes.name: Lemonade
recipes.description: A refreshing sugar-free lemonade, perfect for a hot day.
instructions: In a pitcher, combine fresh lemon juice, cold water, and keto-friendly sweetener (e.g., erythritol, stevia, or allulose - adjust to taste).
Stir well until the sweetener is completely dissolved.
Add ice and lemon slices for garnish.
Taste and adjust lemon juice, water, or sweetener as needed.
Store in the refrigerator.

recipes.name: Iced Coffee
recipes.description: A simple and refreshing keto iced coffee that you can customize.
instructions: Brew strong coffee and let it cool completely, or use chilled leftover coffee or cold brew concentrate.
Fill a glass with ice.
Pour in the chilled coffee.
Add unsweetened almond milk or heavy cream to taste.
Stir in keto-friendly sweetener if desired.
Add a splash of vanilla extract or sugar-free syrup for extra flavor.
ingredients: Chilled brewed coffee or Cold brew concentrate
Unsweetened almond milk or Heavy cream

recipes.name: Electrolyte Drink (Homemade)
recipes.description: A homemade sugar-free drink to help replenish electrolytes on a keto diet.
instructions: In a large water bottle or pitcher, combine water, fresh lemon or lime juice, a pinch of salt (e.g., pink Himalayan salt for minerals), and a small amount of cream of tartar (for potassium) or a keto-friendly potassium supplement.
Add keto-friendly sweetener to taste.
Magnesium powder (e.g., magnesium citrate) can also be added.
Shake or stir well until all ingredients are dissolved.
Serve chilled over ice.
Adjust ingredients based on personal needs and taste.

recipes.name: Golden Milk Latte (Turmeric Latte)
recipes.description: A warm and soothing keto latte with anti-inflammatory turmeric and spices.
instructions: In a small saucepan, gently heat unsweetened almond milk or coconut milk with ground turmeric, ground ginger, a pinch of black pepper (helps turmeric absorption), ground cinnamon, and keto-friendly sweetener to taste.
Whisk continuously until well combined and heated through (do not boil).
For extra creaminess and fats, stir in a teaspoon of coconut oil or MCT oil.
Pour into a mug and enjoy warm.
ingredients: Unsweetened almond milk or Coconut milk
Optional: Coconut oil or MCT oil

recipes.name: Cucumber Mint Cooler
recipes.description: A super refreshing and hydrating drink with cucumber and mint.
instructions: Blend peeled and roughly chopped cucumber with a handful of fresh mint leaves, water, fresh lime or lemon juice, and keto-friendly sweetener to taste until smooth.
Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve if you prefer a smoother drink, or enjoy it with the pulp for extra fiber.
Serve chilled over ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig and a cucumber slice.

recipes.name: Sparkling Water with Berries and Lime
recipes.description: A simple, bubbly, and refreshing keto-friendly drink.
instructions: Fill a glass with ice.
Add a few keto-friendly berries (e.g., raspberries, sliced strawberries, or blueberries - use sparingly).
Squeeze in some fresh lime juice.
Top with plain sparkling water or unflavored seltzer water.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge or mint sprig if desired.
ingredients: Sparkling water or Seltzer water (plain, unflavored)
recipes.notes: Recipe 175 - Sparkling Water with Berries and Lime

recipes.name: Chai Tea Latte
recipes.description: A warm and spicy keto version of a chai tea latte.
instructions: Brew a strong cup of chai tea using a chai tea bag or loose leaf chai (ensure it's unsweetened and keto-friendly spices).
While tea is steeping, heat unsweetened almond milk or coconut milk (or a mix with a splash of heavy cream for richness) until warm.
Froth if desired.
Combine brewed chai tea with the warmed/frothed milk in a mug.
Stir in keto-friendly sweetener to taste and a pinch of extra cinnamon or nutmeg if desired.
ingredients: Chai tea bag or Loose leaf chai (unsweetened)
Unsweetened almond milk or Coconut milk

recipes.name: Raspberry Lime Rickey
recipes.description: A tart and refreshing keto mocktail.
instructions: Muddle a few fresh or thawed frozen raspberries in the bottom of a glass with keto-friendly sweetener to taste.
Squeeze in fresh lime juice.
Fill the glass with ice.
Top with plain sparkling water or club soda.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a lime slice and a few extra raspberries.

recipes.name: Infused Water (Lemon, Cucumber, Mint)
recipes.description: A simple way to flavor water naturally, making hydration more enjoyable.
instructions: Thinly slice lemon and cucumber.
Gather fresh mint sprigs.
Add lemon slices, cucumber slices, and mint sprigs to a pitcher of cold water.
Let it infuse in the refrigerator for at least 1-2 hours (or longer for more flavor).
Serve chilled.
Other keto-friendly additions could be berries or ginger.

recipes.name: Eggnog (Seasonal)
recipes.description: A rich and creamy keto-friendly eggnog for the holiday season.
instructions: In a saucepan, gently heat unsweetened almond milk and heavy cream with keto-friendly sweetener, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, and a pinch of ground cloves.
Do not boil.
In a separate bowl, whisk egg yolks until pale.
Temper the egg yolks by slowly whisking in a small amount of the warm cream mixture.
Then, pour the tempered yolk mixture back into the saucepan with the remaining cream.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens enough to coat the back of a spoon (about 5-7 minutes).
Do not let it curdle.
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract and optional rum extract or brandy extract (for flavor).
Strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a pitcher or bowl.
Let cool, then chill thoroughly in the refrigerator for at least 2-4 hours.
Serve cold, optionally topped with keto whipped cream and a sprinkle of nutmeg.
ingredients: Optional: Rum extract or Brandy extract

recipes.name: Italian Cream Soda
recipes.description: A refreshing and creamy keto soda using sugar-free syrup.
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice.
Add 1-2 tablespoons of your favorite sugar-free syrup (e.g., vanilla, raspberry, strawberry - ensure it's keto-friendly with no maltitol if possible).
Pour in plain sparkling water or club soda, leaving about an inch at the top.
Gently pour 1-2 tablespoons of heavy cream over the back of a spoon on top of the soda so it floats or gently mixes.
Stir lightly if desired, or enjoy layered.
Optionally top with keto whipped cream.

recipes.name: Warm Spiced Apple Cider (Mock)
recipes.description: A comforting warm drink with apple cider spices, without the sugary apple juice.
instructions: In a saucepan, combine water, a few drops of apple extract (optional, for flavor), keto-friendly sweetener to taste, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, and a star anise (optional).
A pinch of allspice can also be added.
Bring to a simmer and cook gently for 15-20 minutes to allow spices to infuse.
Strain out the whole spices.
Serve warm in mugs.
A pat of butter can be stirred in for richness if desired.
Garnish with a cinnamon stick.
ingredients: Optional: Apple extract (sugar-free), Star anise, Allspice, Butter

recipes.name: Peppermint Mocha (Seasonal)
recipes.description: A festive keto coffee drink with chocolate and peppermint flavors.
instructions: Brew a strong cup of coffee.
In a mug, combine hot coffee with unsweetened cocoa powder, keto-friendly sweetener to taste, and a few drops of peppermint extract (be careful, it's potent).
Stir well until cocoa is dissolved.
For creaminess, stir in a tablespoon or two of heavy cream or unsweetened almond milk.
Top with keto whipped cream and a sprinkle of sugar-free chocolate shavings or a tiny piece of sugar-free peppermint candy (if you can find one).
ingredients: Optional: Heavy cream or Unsweetened almond milk, Keto whipped cream, Sugar-free chocolate shavings

recipes.name: Simple Iced Tea (Unsweetened or Sweetened)
recipes.description: Classic iced tea, made keto-friendly by using your choice of tea and optional keto sweetener.
instructions: Brew your favorite tea (black, green, herbal - check ingredients for no added sugars or fruit pieces that might add carbs) stronger than usual, using 2-3 tea bags per 2 cups of hot water.
Let steep for 5-10 minutes.
Remove tea bags.
If desired, stir in keto-friendly sweetener while the tea is still warm to help it dissolve.
Let the tea concentrate cool to room temperature, then refrigerate until chilled.
To serve, fill glasses with ice.
Pour tea concentrate halfway, then top with cold water (or fill with tea concentrate for stronger tea).
Add lemon slices or mint if desired.
ingredients: Tea bags (black, green, or herbal - unsweetened)
Optional: Keto-friendly sweetener, Lemon slices, Mint
recipes.notes: Recipe 183 - Simple Iced Tea (Unsweetened or Sweetened)

recipes.name: Burger Bowls
instructions: Cook 1 lb ground beef patties or crumbles.
Assemble bowls: bed of lettuce or spinach, cooked beef, crumbled bacon, sliced avocado, pickles, chopped tomato (in moderation), shredded cheddar cheese.
Drizzle with sugar-free dressing (like ranch or a mayo/mustard mix).

recipes.name: Bunless Burgers + Sautéed Mushrooms & Asparagus
instructions: Form ground beef into patties, season with salt, pepper, garlic powder.
Cook patties (grill/pan-fry) to desired doneness.
Top with cheese if desired.
Slice mushrooms, sauté in butter with minced garlic, salt, pepper until browned.
Trim asparagus, toss with olive oil, salt, pepper.
Roast at 400°F (200°C) for 10-15 mins or pan-fry until tender-crisp.
recipes.notes: Recipe 185 - Bunless Burgers + Sautéed Mushrooms & Asparagus

recipes.name: Chili
instructions: Brown 1-5 lbs ground beef with 1/2 chopped onion and 1 chopped green bell pepper.
Drain fat.
Stir in 1 can (5 oz) diced tomatoes (undrained), 2 tbsp tomato paste, 2-3 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tsp garlic powder, salt, pepper to taste.
Add 1/2 cup water or beef broth.
Simmer covered for at least 30 minutes, longer for better flavor.
Top with shredded cheddar, sour cream, sliced avocado, or jalapeños.
ingredients: Chili powder, Cumin, Garlic powder, Salt, Pepper
Toppings: Cheddar cheese, Sour cream, Avocado, Jalapeños

recipes.name: Meatza (Meat Crust Pizza)
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a bowl, mix 1 lb ground beef (or Italian sausage) with 1 egg, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, salt, pepper.
Press mixture thinly (about 1/4 inch) onto a parchment-lined baking sheet into a round pizza shape.
Bake for 15-20 mins until cooked through.
Carefully drain off any excess fat.
Spread a thin layer of low-sugar pizza sauce over the meat crust.
Top generously with shredded mozzarella cheese and desired keto toppings (pepperoni, cooked sausage, mushrooms, olives, green peppers, onion slices).
Bake for another 10-15 minutes until cheese is bubbly and melted.
ingredients: Italian seasoning, Garlic powder, Salt, Pepper
Keto toppings (pepperoni, mushrooms, olives, peppers, onion etc.)

recipes.name: Nachos (Pork Rind Base)
instructions: Brown 1/2 lb ground beef with taco seasoning (low-carb).
Spread pork rinds (or cheese chips*) on an oven-safe plate or baking sheet.
Top with cooked taco meat, shredded cheddar/Mexican cheese blend, sliced jalapeños.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 5-10 mins until cheese is melted and bubbly.

Serve immediately topped with sour cream, guacamole, and/or low-carb salsa. *Cheese Chips: Place small mounds of shredded cheddar on parchment paper, bake at 375°F (190°C) until melted and slightly browned/crispy (watch carefully).
ingredients: Pork rinds (plain) or Cheddar cheese (for chips)
Toppings: Sour cream, Guacamole (avocado, lime, salt, onion/cilantro), Low-carb salsa

recipes.name: Shepherd’s Pie (Cauliflower Mash Topping)
instructions: Brown 1 lb ground beef or lamb with 1/2 chopped onion, 1 chopped celery stalk, 2 minced garlic cloves.
Drain fat.
Stir in 1/2 cup beef broth, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, herbs (e.g., 1/2 tsp dried rosemary/thyme).
Simmer 10 mins.
Stir in 1/2 cup chopped green beans or other low-carb veg instead of peas/carrots.
Steam 1 large head cauliflower until very tender.
Drain EXTREMELY well (pat dry).
Mash or blend with 2-4 tbsp butter, 2-4 tbsp heavy cream or cream cheese, salt, pepper, garlic powder until smooth.
Spread meat mixture in baking dish, top evenly with cauliflower mash.
Optional: sprinkle Parmesan on top.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20-25 mins until bubbly and top is slightly browned.
ingredients: Salt, Pepper, Garlic powder, Dried rosemary/thyme (optional)

recipes.name: Sloppy Joes (Lettuce Wraps/Chaffles)
instructions: Brown 1 lb ground beef, drain fat.
Add 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1/4 cup chopped green pepper, sauté until soft.

Stir in 1/2 cup sugar-free tomato sauce or crushed tomatoes, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tbsp yellow mustard, 1 tsp chili powder, salt, pepper, and keto-sweetener to taste (optional).
Simmer 10-15 mins.
Serve in lettuce wraps, over chaffles, or plain.
Serve with side salad (romaine, cucumber, oil/vinegar).

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers (Beef & Cauli Rice)
instructions: Cut 3-4 bell peppers (any color) in half lengthwise, remove seeds.
Pre-bake shells slightly if preferred (10 mins at 375°F).
Brown 1 lb ground beef with 1/2 chopped onion.
Drain fat.
Mix beef with 1 cup riced cauliflower (raw or lightly steamed), 1/2 cup low-sugar marinara or tomato sauce, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, salt, pepper.
Fill pepper halves with mixture.
Top with shredded cheddar or mozzarella cheese.
Place in a baking dish with about 1/2 inch water or broth in the bottom.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30-40 mins until peppers are tender and filling is hot.
recipes.notes: Recipe 191 - Stuffed Bell Peppers (Beef & Cauli Rice)

recipes.name: Taco Skillet
instructions: Brown 1 lb ground beef with 1/2 chopped onion.
Drain fat.
Stir in 1 packet taco seasoning (low-carb) or homemade (chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, pepper).
Add 1/2 cup water/broth and 1/4 cup salsa (optional).
Simmer 5 mins.
Top with shredded cheese, avocado slices, sour cream, jalapeños.
ingredients: Taco seasoning (low-carb) or spices (chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic/onion powder)

recipes.name: Zucchini Lasagna
instructions: Brown 1 lb ground beef or Italian sausage.
Stir in 1 cup low-sugar marinara sauce.
Slice 2-3 medium zucchini lengthwise thinly (use a mandoline if possible).
Pat slices dry.
Mix 1 cup ricotta cheese with 1 egg and 1/4 cup Parmesan, salt, pepper.
Layer in a baking dish: thin layer of sauce, zucchini slices, ricotta mixture, meat sauce, shredded mozzarella.
Repeat layers.
End with sauce and mozzarella.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30-40 mins until bubbly and zucchini is tender.
Let rest 10 mins before slicing.

recipes.name: Avocado Chicken Salad
instructions: Combine cooked grilled/shredded chicken, diced avocado, chopped spinach or lettuce, chopped cucumber, hemp seeds (optional).
Mix olive oil + red wine vinegar (or lemon juice) + salt + pepper.

recipes.name: Buffalo Chicken Bake (or Dip)
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix 2 cups cooked shredded chicken, 4 oz softened cream cheese, 1/4 cup buffalo sauce (like Frank's), 1/4 cup ranch dressing (keto-friendly), 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese.
Spread in a small baking dish.
Top with another 1/4 cup cheddar.
Bake 15-20 minutes until bubbly.
Eat as is, or serve with celery sticks or pork rinds.
Can also be served over roasted cauliflower.
ingredients: Optional serving: Celery, Pork rinds, Cauliflower

recipes.name: Buffalo Wings + Ranch + Celery/Cucumber Sticks
instructions: Pat chicken wings dry.
Toss with 1-2 tbsp baking powder (NOT soda) and salt for crispiness.
Arrange on wire rack over baking sheet.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 40-50 mins, flipping halfway, until crispy and cooked through.
Toss hot wings in sauce.
Melt 1/4 cup butter and whisk in 1/4 to 1/2 cup Frank's RedHot sauce (or similar low-carb buffalo sauce).
Serve with celery/cucumber sticks and keto-friendly ranch or blue cheese dressing.
ingredients: Keto Ranch or Blue Cheese dressing
recipes.notes: Recipe 196 - Buffalo Wings + Ranch + Celery/Cucumber Sticks

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo over Broccoli
instructions: Melt 2 tbsp butter in a saucepan.
Sauté 2 cloves minced garlic until fragrant.
Whisk in 1 cup heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Reduce heat, whisk in 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper.
Pour sauce over cooked chicken breast (sliced or cubed) and steamed broccoli florets.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad (No Croutons)
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce.
Top with cooked grilled chicken slices and shaved or grated Parmesan cheese.
Toss with sugar-free Caesar dressing.

recipes.name: Chicken Thighs + Brussels Sprouts with Bacon
instructions: Cook 4-6 bacon slices until crisp; remove bacon, reserve 1-2 tbsp drippings in pan (or use olive oil).
Season 4-6 chicken thighs (bone-in or boneless) with salt, pepper, garlic powder.
Sear thighs in bacon drippings/oil until browned, then finish in oven at 400°F (200°C) until cooked through (165°F internal temp).
While chicken cooks, trim and halve 1 lb Brussels sprouts.
Toss sprouts with olive oil (or reserved drippings), salt, pepper.
Roast on a baking sheet at 400°F (200°C) for 20-30 mins until tender and caramelized, shaking pan halfway.
Crumble cooked bacon over sprouts before serving alongside chicken.
recipes.notes: Recipe 199 - Chicken Thighs + Brussels Sprouts with Bacon

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Chicken Thighs + Roasted Green Beans
instructions: Toss 4-6 bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs with olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder.
Roast at 400°F (200°C) for 35-45 mins until cooked through.
Toss green beans with olive oil, salt, pepper; add to the pan for the last 15-20 mins.
In the final 5 mins, add 2-3 tbsp butter and 2-3 minced garlic cloves to the pan juices, spoon over chicken/beans.
recipes.notes: Recipe 200 - Garlic Butter Chicken Thighs + Roasted Green Beans

recipes.name: Garlic Parmesan Chicken Tenders + Coleslaw
instructions: Cut chicken breast into strips.
Prepare dredge: mix grated Parmesan cheese, almond flour (optional, 1-2 tbsp for texture), garlic powder, salt, pepper, Italian seasoning.
Dip chicken strips in beaten egg, then press into dredge mixture to coat.
Pan-fry in olive/avocado oil over medium heat or bake at 400°F (200°C) for 15-20 mins until golden and cooked through.
Combine shredded cabbage (and a tiny amount of shredded carrot if desired, watch carbs) with keto mayo, apple cider vinegar, keto sweetener (like erythritol/stevia) to taste, salt, and pepper.
ingredients: Garlic powder, Italian seasoning, Salt, Pepper
recipes.notes: Recipe 201 - Garlic Parmesan Chicken Tenders + Coleslaw

recipes.name: Greek Salad with Chicken
instructions: Combine chopped romaine lettuce, cucumber slices, crumbled feta cheese, Kalamata olives, sliced red onion (use sparingly).
Top with cooked grilled chicken slices.
Whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, pepper.

recipes.name: BLT Salad
instructions: Combine chopped romaine lettuce, cooked crumbled bacon, chopped tomato (in moderation), sliced avocado.
Toss with keto ranch dressing or simple olive oil & vinegar.
ingredients: Keto Ranch dressing or Olive oil & vinegar

recipes.name: Deli Roll-Ups (Ham variation)
instructions: Lay out slices of deli ham (check for low sugar/fillers).
Spread with cream cheese or mustard/mayo.
Top with a slice of cheese (provolone, swiss, cheddar) and optionally a lettuce leaf or pickle spear (sugar-free).
Roll up tightly. (Can also use turkey/roast beef - see 'Other')

recipes.name: Pizza (Fathead Crust - Pepperoni)
instructions: Microwave 5 cups shredded mozzarella + 2 oz cream cheese for 60-90 secs until melted.
Stir in 3/4 cup almond flour, 1 egg, pinch of salt.
Knead well.
Press dough thinly between parchment paper onto a pizza pan.
Bake at 425°F (220°C) for 8-10 mins.
Add toppings (sugar-free sauce, cheese, pepperoni) and bake another 5-10 mins.
Combine Romaine lettuce, grated Parmesan cheese, and sugar-free Caesar dressing.
No croutons.
ingredients: Toppings: Sugar-free pizza sauce, more cheese, pepperoni
For Salad: Romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, Sugar-free Caesar dressing

recipes.name: Pork Chops + Cabbage Stir Fry
instructions: Season thick-cut pork chops with salt, pepper, garlic powder.
Pan-sear in oil/butter or bake at 400°F (200°C) until cooked through (internal temp 145°F/63°C).
Heat avocado/sesame oil in a wok or large skillet.
Add shredded cabbage, sliced onion, maybe some bell pepper strips.
Stir fry until tender-crisp.
Season with soy sauce/tamari, minced ginger, minced garlic.
recipes.notes: Recipe 206 - Pork Chops + Cabbage Stir Fry

recipes.name: Sausage & Cabbage Skillet
instructions: Slice 1 lb pre-cooked sausage (like kielbasa, andouille, or smoked sausage - check labels for low sugar/carbs) into rounds.
Heat 1 tbsp olive or avocado oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add sliced sausage and brown lightly (3-5 mins).
Add 1/2 chopped onion (optional) and 1 small head shredded cabbage (about 6-8 cups).
Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10-15 minutes until cabbage wilts and becomes tender.
Season with salt, pepper, maybe 1 tsp paprika or a splash of apple cider vinegar for tang.
ingredients: Optional: Onion, Paprika, Apple cider vinegar

recipes.name: Creamy Tuscan Salmon + Zucchini Noodles
instructions: Pan-sear 2 salmon fillets.
Remove.
Sauté 2 cloves minced garlic in 1 tbsp butter/olive oil.
Add 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1/4 cup chicken broth, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan, 1 cup spinach, 1/4 cup sun-dried tomatoes (oil-packed, drained).
Simmer until sauce thickens slightly and spinach wilts.
Return salmon to pan to coat.
Serve over zucchini noodles (spiralized zucchini, lightly sautéed or raw).
recipes.notes: Recipe 208 - Creamy Tuscan Salmon + Zucchini Noodles

recipes.name: One-Pan Garlic Lemon Salmon + Spinach
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place 2-4 salmon fillets on the sheet.
Drizzle generously with olive oil.
Top with 2-4 cloves minced garlic, juice of 1/2 lemon, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 12-15 minutes, depending on thickness.
In the last 5 minutes of cooking, toss 4-5 cups fresh spinach with a little olive oil, salt, pepper and add it to the baking sheet around the salmon to wilt.
Serve immediately.
recipes.notes: Recipe 209 - One-Pan Garlic Lemon Salmon + Spinach

recipes.name: Shrimp & Avocado Salad
instructions: Combine cooked shrimp (chilled), diced avocado, chopped cilantro or parsley, finely diced red onion (optional).
Toss gently with lime juice, olive oil, salt, pepper.

recipes.name: Shrimp Zoodle Stir Fry
instructions: Heat avocado oil or sesame oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Sauté 1 tbsp minced garlic and 1 tsp minced ginger until fragrant (30 secs).
Add 1 lb peeled shrimp, cook until pink (2-3 mins).
Add spiralized zucchini noodles (2-3 medium zucchini) and other low-carb veggies (e.g., sliced bell peppers, broccoli florets).
Stir fry briefly (2-4 mins) until zoodles are slightly tender but not mushy.
Toss with 2-3 tbsp soy sauce/tamari, maybe a pinch of keto sweetener or a dash of rice vinegar (optional).
Garnish with sesame seeds if desired.
ingredients: Optional: Bell peppers, broccoli, keto sweetener, rice vinegar, sesame seeds

recipes.name: Simple Salmon or Tuna Salad
instructions: Drain 1 can salmon or tuna.
Mix with 2-3 tbsp keto mayonnaise, 1 tsp mustard, optional chopped celery or pickles (sugar-free), salt, pepper.
Serve over lettuce, stuffed in avocado halves, or with pork rinds/celery sticks.
ingredients: Optional: Celery, Sugar-free pickles, Avocado, Lettuce, Pork Rinds
recipes.notes: Recipe 212 - Simple Salmon or Tuna Salad

recipes.name: Tuna or Chicken Salad Avocado Boats
instructions: Prepare Tuna Salad: Mix 1 can drained tuna with 2-3 tbsp keto mayo, 1 tsp mustard, optional chopped celery/pickle, salt, pepper.
Cut 1 avocado in half, remove pit.
Fill avocado halves with the tuna salad. (Can also use chicken - see 'Chicken')
recipes.notes: Recipe 213 - Tuna or Chicken Salad Avocado Boats

recipes.name: Broccoli Egg Bake Squares
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Grease an 8x8 inch baking dish.
Whisk 6-8 eggs with 1/4 cup heavy cream or unsweetened almond milk, salt, pepper, garlic powder.
Stir in 1 cup steamed chopped broccoli and 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese.
Pour into dish.
Bake 20-25 minutes until set.
Cool slightly and cut into squares.
Serve warm or cold, perhaps with cucumber slices or avocado.
ingredients: Heavy cream or Unsweetened almond milk

recipes.name: Deli Roll-Ups (Turkey/Beef variation)
instructions: Lay out slices of deli meat (turkey, roast beef - check for low sugar/fillers).
Spread with cream cheese or mustard/mayo.
Top with a slice of cheese (provolone, swiss, cheddar) and optionally a lettuce leaf or pickle spear (sugar-free).
Roll up tightly. (Can also use ham - see 'Pork')

recipes.name: Egg Salad (Lettuce Wraps/Plain)
instructions: Chop 3-4 hard-boiled eggs.
Mix with 2-3 tbsp keto mayonnaise, 1 tsp mustard (Dijon or yellow), 1-2 tbsp chopped celery, 1 tbsp chopped olives (optional), salt, and pepper.
Serve in romaine lettuce leaves/cups or eat with a fork.

recipes.name: Simple Cheese & Pickle Plate
instructions: Arrange slices or cubes of your favorite cheese (cheddar, provolone, mozzarella), some sugar-free pickles, maybe some olives or nuts, and a couple of hard-boiled eggs.

recipes.name: Nuts (in moderation)
instructions: Macadamia nuts, Pecans, Walnuts, Almonds

recipes.name: Seeds (in moderation)
instructions: Chia seeds, Flax seeds, Hemp seeds, Pumpkin seeds (Pepitas)

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Fat Bombs
instructions: Gently melt 1/2 cup coconut oil and 1/2 cup natural peanut/almond butter over low heat or microwave.
Stir until smooth.
Remove from heat.
Stir in 2-3 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder and keto sweetener (like liquid stevia or powdered erythritol) to taste.
Pour into silicone candy molds or mini muffin liners.
Freeze until solid (about 30-60 mins).
Store in freezer.
recipes.notes: Recipe 220 - Peanut Butter Chocolate Fat Bombs

recipes.name: Vanilla Coconut Almond Fat Bombs
instructions: Gently melt 1/2 cup coconut oil and 1/4 cup natural almond butter.
Stir until smooth.
Remove from heat.
Stir in 1/4 cup unsweetened shredded coconut, 1 tsp vanilla extract, pinch of salt, and keto sweetener to taste.
Pour into molds.
Freeze until solid.
Store in freezer.
recipes.notes: Recipe 221 - Vanilla Coconut Almond Fat Bombs

recipes.name: Lemon Coconut Fat Bombs
instructions: Gently melt 1/2 cup coconut oil.
Stir in 1/2 cup unsweetened shredded coconut, 1 tsp lemon extract (or zest of 1 lemon), pinch of salt, and keto sweetener to taste.
Pour into molds.
Freeze until solid.
Store in freezer.

recipes.name: Chia Seed Pudding
instructions: In a jar or container, combine 2 tbsp chia seeds, 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk (or coconut milk), and keto sweetener to taste.
Add 1 tsp cocoa powder for chocolate flavor, or 1/2 tsp vanilla extract for vanilla.
Stir or shake well.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours, or preferably overnight, until thick like pudding.
Stir again before eating.

recipes.name: Coconut Bites
instructions: Mix 1 cup unsweetened shredded coconut with 1/4 cup melted coconut oil and keto sweetener to taste.
Add vanilla or cocoa if desired.
Roll into small balls.
Refrigerate or freeze until firm.

recipes.name: Low-Carb Chocolate
instructions: Brands like Lily's (sweetened with stevia/erythritol) or ChocZero (sweetened with monk fruit) offer bars, chips, and sometimes peanut butter cups.
Enjoy in moderation.

recipes.name: Berries (Small Amounts)
instructions: A small handful of raspberries, blackberries, or strawberries with unsweetened whipped heavy cream can be an occasional treat (track carbs).

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff with Shirataki Noodles
recipes.description: Creamy beef stroganoff served over low-carb shirataki noodles.
instructions: Brown sliced beef in butter.
Remove and sauté onions and mushrooms.
Add beef broth and simmer.
Stir in sour cream and Dijon mustard.
Return beef to pan.
Serve over rinsed and heated shirataki noodles.
recipes.notes: Recipe 227 - Beef Stroganoff with Shirataki Noodles

recipes.name: Chicken Bacon Ranch Casserole
recipes.description: A hearty casserole combining chicken, bacon, cheese, and ranch dressing.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Combine cooked shredded chicken, cooked chopped bacon, shredded cheddar cheese, and ranch dressing in a baking dish.
Top with more cheese.
Bake until bubbly.

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp Zoodles
recipes.description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic butter, served over zucchini noodles.
instructions: Sauté shrimp in butter with minced garlic.
Spiralize zucchini into noodles.
Toss zoodles with shrimp and pan sauce.
Season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, lemon juice to taste

recipes.name: Creamy Spinach Stuffed Chicken
recipes.description: Chicken breasts stuffed with creamy spinach and cheese filling.
instructions: Slice chicken breasts to create pockets.
Mix cream cheese, chopped spinach, and shredded mozzarella.
Stuff chicken.
Season and bake at 375°F until cooked through.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipes.description: A low-carb take on the classic beef and broccoli stir fry.
instructions: Sauté sliced beef in avocado oil.
Add broccoli florets and continue cooking.
Stir in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
Cook until broccoli is tender-crisp.
ingredients: 1 lb beef flank or sirloin, sliced
recipes.notes: Recipe 231 - Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry

recipes.name: Avocado Egg Salad
recipes.description: Creamy egg salad with avocado for healthy fats.
instructions: Mash hard-boiled eggs with diced avocado.
Stir in mayo, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

recipes.name: Buffalo Cauliflower Bites
recipes.description: Spicy roasted cauliflower bites.
instructions: Toss cauliflower florets with olive oil and buffalo sauce.
Roast at 400°F until tender-crisp.

recipes.name: Chocolate Coconut Fat Bombs
recipes.description: Rich fat bombs with chocolate and coconut.
instructions: Melt coconut oil and unsweetened chocolate.
Stir in shredded coconut and sweetener.
Pour into molds and freeze until solid.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Cheesecake Fat Bombs
recipes.description: Creamy peanut butter cheesecake bites.
instructions: Mix cream cheese, peanut butter, and sweetener.
Shape into balls and refrigerate.
recipes.notes: Recipe 235 - Peanut Butter Cheesecake Fat Bombs

recipes.name: Lemon Blueberry Fat Bombs
recipes.description: Refreshing lemon fat bombs with blueberries.
instructions: Mix coconut oil, lemon zest, and sweetener.
Stir in a few blueberries.
Pour into molds and freeze.
